11112111211122.content:
Sakura moved around the garden quickly, examining the towering flowers. One enormous plant, in particular, caught her attention. It was very exotic looking with brilliant blue petals on its blooms. Even though she’d worked with this plant in her studies as Tsunade’s apprentice, she simply couldn’t quite remember its name. For a second she considered the idea of asking her teacher about it, but decided against it. It would seem foolish to do so after having spent so much time studying under the hokage.

“So then,” Naruto chimed, catching the group’s attention. “When do we begin this training? I wanna get started as soon as possible.”

Tsunade smiled, charmed by his enthusiasm. “Don’t you think it would be wise for us to get used to this state first?” Ino stared at the fifth as though she were crazy.

“You can get used to something like this?” she asked. “I mean, this is just too bizarre!”

“It’s bizarre, yes, but the human body is very adaptable. Back in the academy, none of you would have ever imagined that you’d be able to walk upon water, but now you’re all able to do so with ease, correct?” The three ninja agreed, and Tsunade continued, “So your bodies have adapted to that sort of chakra manipulation. It’s the same process here, really. You just have to let your body get used to the change.”

“Alright,” Naruto began once more, staring off into the distance to avoid laying his eyes upon his naked team members. “Do we really have to be naked to do this?”
11112111211122.title: Get Used To It

111121112111222.content:
Tsunade let out a light chuckle, then turned and walked over to a small wooden chest. As she opened its battered lid, it let out a loud “creaking” sound. Naruto craned his neck to catch a glimpse of what was inside the box. All he could see was black.

“What kind of suit?” Sakura asked, concerned for how she’d look in it.

Ino shuddered, then said, “Please tell me it’s not one of Gai-sensei’s elastic green outfits.”

“No, no,” Tsunade replied, “It’s something I’ve designed myself, and it’s been designed specifically for our current assignment.” She pulled out a mass of black clothing, then separated them. The suits consisted of pure black clothe, and on the back of each one was a small slug logo. She tossed a suit to each of the young ninja, and they all looked their respective suits over for a second before climbing into them. The suits were snug, tightly conforming to their bodies. Tsunade put hers on as well, and Naruto couldn’t help but look the three female ninja over. Their every curve was accentuated by the black suits that they wore. The fifth hokage, the bustiest and most voluptuous of them all, then bent over and pulled out four more items. “And these are your mission pouches. Inside you have six star-shuriken, six kunai knives, a canteen filled with fresh water, and a small medical kit.”

She then handed out the packs, adding, “They’re to be strapped to your body using the piece of cloth that’s inside.” Naruto pulled out the cloth from inside the pack, and then began to strap it to his left thigh. Sakura tied hers to her right arm, and Ino to her left. Tsunade chose her right thigh, and the four were finally ready to begin their training.

“Now, then, I’m going to explain how this will work,” Tsunade said, closing the wooden chest. “Right now, you’re all about six inches tall, while I’m a bit taller. At this size, it’s going to be hard to navigate through the world. The house behind me is our target.” They all turned to examine the massive house. It was a red brick building, very industrial looking. “We’ll be entering through an opening in the side of the building. Inside are several rooms full of dangerous traps, vicious creatures, and all around harsh environments. Our goal is to reach the final room. There we’ll be greeted by Jiraiya, and he’ll return us to full height. Understand?” Everyone nodded. “Alright, then let’s begin.”

Tsunade led the way toward the right side of the building, while Sakura hurriedly picked a petal from the blue exotic flower she’d seen earlier. ‘Just in case,’ she thought to herself, ‘I happen to remember what it does.’ As the group made their way toward the entrance, Ino turned and looked at Sakura, who was shoving the giant petal into her pack.

“What is that, you sneaky little cheat?” she asked, as Sakura zipped the pack up quickly. “Did Tsunade-sama say that we could bring along outside objects?” Sakura shrugged smugly.

“She didn’t say that we couldn’t,” she answered. “And besides, it’s just a stupid flower.”

The group finally reached the entrance, which was merely a large hole in the brick wall. Tsunade turned to face her students, and asked, “Are you all prepared for this? Have your eyes adjusted to the new perspective?”

Naruto looked around, then exclaimed, “Wow! They have! That’s pretty cool, I didn’t think they’d do that.” As he turned to look at the enormous shrub behind him, he found that it was not only clear, but that it seemed normal. “This is one hell of a training session.”

“Consider it more of a mission,” Tsunade told him. “And remember, there is the possibility of death, so look sharp. Oh, and before we begin, you all need to give me ten push-ups.” The group stared at her awkwardly.

“You’re serious?” Ino asked.

“I’m dead serious. You’ll need to get your muscles used to the new gravitational pull on your body. So hurry up and do what I said.” She watched as they all got down to the ground and did ten push-ups each, all of them straining to do so. When they stood, they were all floored. “Haha, you see, this new height is quite different. Now let’s go.”

With that, they walked through the hole, and into pitch black darkness. When they finally saw light, where were they?
111121112111222.title: Perspective Shift

1111211121112221.content:
The group stared up at their new surroundings, finding a room that may have seemed all too normal had they been their original height, but at their smaller stature, the room seemed overpowering. There was a desk with a chair pushed under it, as well as a giant bed with plain, off-white sheets, and two large doors. Naruto made his way toward the bed, then began to tug on the sheets, which didn’t give way.

“Wow,” he said. “This is really weird.” The others quietly agreed, examining the other objects. Ino found a pencil in the corner, though it wasn’t like any other pencil they’d ever seen. In fact, it was perhaps an inch or two shorter than they were, and no more than that. Sakura joined her in looking over the pencil, and the two attempted to pick up the pencil without success.

“Alright, so, our goal here is to find a way to get through these doors. That, and plus, we have to figure out which door is the best choice.” Tsunade pulled out a small sheet of paper from her pack, as well as some sort of pen. As she scribbled on the sheet, she explained, “And even I don’t know which one is which. While they were designing it, I asked them not to inform of anything.”

As Sakura moved toward Naruto, who was still tugging hard on the sheet, she suddenly realized what the flower she’d pulled a petal from was. That flower was called the “Giant Slip.” A book she’d read had told her all about its properties. When eaten, the flower was said to release Human Growth Hormone into the body in massive amounts. If the petals of the flower were bitten into, then the hormone would flood the body all at once, but if the petals were swallowed whole, then the effect would be much slower.

Sakura took the petal from her pack and stared hard at it. Did she want to try it?
1111211121112221.title: The Big Room

11112111211122212.content:
Sakura turned the petal over in her hands, amazed by the veins that ran up and down its surface. She was trying to decide whether or not she wanted to eat it, and wondering what its effects would be at her size. A full grown human would need to eat many petals to see any kind of results, but at her size she obviously wouldn’t need much. But did she really want to risk any potential side effects?

Before she could make her decision, Ino approached her and looked at the petal. “What’re you doing?” she asked.

“Trying to decide whether to eat it or not…” Sakura answered, not thinking. “If it makes me big, then that’d be great, but what if it made me too big?” Ino’s eyes widened, and she grabbed the petal from Sakura’s hands.

“This thing makes you big?” She asked, moving it closer to her mouth.

“Don’t!” Sakura cried out, getting the attention of the others. Does she eat it?

1112221.content:
Naruto Uzumaki . The enigma of Konoha. Nobody really knows Naruto except for the fact that he can be very hyper active and energetic at times. When people describe Naruto, they call him an annoying bundle of energy that just doesn’t know how to be contained. And he’s also really dense. Specially when it comes it girls. He never really knew how to talk to girls. For example, Hinata, Sakura or even the Hokage. His current interest in a girl happened to lie in one that at times, wasn’t even considered a girl but just a tomboy. His method of trying to get closer to girls was idiotic and borderline devious. But the devious part was his natural prankster side. So when one day, he stumbled into a certain girl’s training field, he never really knew what he was getting himself into. (A/N so cliché)

He didn’t exactly stumble into her training ground. He accidentally tripped a wire of hers that launched a series of explosions raining across the area. The last thing he remembered was two chocolate eyes looking down at him in concern… and laughter?

Tenten. She was his object of interest for a long time. Ever since he saw her at the Chunnin Exams, that inkling sparkle deep in him seem to grow ever so slow. Sure, Sakura is smart and beautiful and Hinata is just outstandling cute. But Tenten was both. She didn’t have a blood line or she didn’t come from a rich family. She worked just as hard as Lee to become one of the best weapons expert in Konoha. To all the rookie nine girls, she was considered their big sister. Tenten was funny, cute, sexy, and smart. The only problem was that she didn’t know how to stand out from a group of prodigies. She was probably one of the most unknown/underestimated kunoichi’s of Konoha.

So when Naruto actually noticed her, his interest sparked. He didn’t stalk her in any form or obsess about her in an unhealthy way. But his ears would perk up like a foxes when her name would pop up. Or he would steal glances at her when she entered the conversation. And his eyes would seem to linger longer than usual when she would cross his path. In short, Naruto had a crush.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------------------

He awoke a couple of hours later to the bright sun light sprinkling across the trees that surrounded the training ground. A light giggle could be heard somewhere close. He swiveled his head to greet Tenten.

“You smell like burnt ramen.” She smiled and came closer. She looked at his clothing and saw the black tears of fabric.

She shook her head in amazement. “I swear an hour ago you had cuts and scratches.”

He looked at her sheepishly. “I heal faster than normal.”

Her eyes zoned in on his deep cerulean ones. She was trying to search for that hidden secret of his.

Naruto on the other hand stood up and took off his jumpsuit revealing a lightly blacken tee and black mesh shorts.

Tenten’s sight departed from his eyes and started roaming his body with unabashed curiosity. Naruto felt self-conscious and started to blush. She saw his blush and turned around quickly.

The pervery side of Naruto instantly took advantage of the situation and his eyes locked onto her goodies. (Hehehehe)

“So Naruto, whatcha doing stalking me?” Her back was still turned to him.

Startled, he tried to respond casually. “I, uh, I wasn’t stalking you Tenten. I was, ummm just walking by.” He nodded his head to no one. “Yea… Yup… just walking by.”

She turned towards her again. “I don’t believe that Naruto.” Her eyes hypnotized him. “If you were just walking by, you would be far from here. This is a training ground if you hadn’t noticed and it’s pretty far in the forest.”

He looked at the ground like a chasentized child. ‘Just tell her the truth man.’

Still staring at the ground, he replied. “Fine Tenten, I’m your number one fanboy…” he trailed off.

Tenten was shocked. ‘What? What? He thinks… I have a fanboy?’

For those out there reading, a fanboy/girl is a person who is obsessed about another person. They usually tend to live in herds and feed off the person’s air they obsess about. They tend to go as far as collecting strands of hair and their “unmentionables”. The fan groupies usually carries posters declaring their undying love for their idol. They at times, scream out sexual phrases like “I want to have your babies!” or “I want to make sweet monkey love to you!” In other words, they are mindless zombies who are very horny.

And when Naruto said those dreaded words… well he just unleashed his demise. Or plan… who knows. But Naruto didn’t really know what a fan groupie was. He just thought it meant they liked someone. Which explains why he can be dense at times.

Tenten was still dazed. ‘He likes me? Why?’ “Why the hell do you like me Naruto? You barely know me.”

“Well, your right about that. But I… I don’t know.” He tried to explain in jerky movements. His hands flailing all about as his eye looked at everything but her. “You train hard and do your best. You’re mysterious too and nobody really knows who you are. Hell, I even asked your teammates once and they don’t even know your last name! Plus, you’re hot… I mean Tenten, I want to get to know you more and stuff. Like maybe on a date?” ‘Puppy eye Jutsu on now!’

She just stared at him. ‘Did he just say I’m hot?’ She inwardly blushed at that. ‘Well he is… interesting… Should I go out with him?’

‘Why not?’ Her flirty side said.

'Ho...come on!' TenTen thought back

"Alright. but no ramen, honestly is that all you eat?"

"Well...every other place alwasy chased me out..."Naruto said unconfromtoly
TenTen winced,but she grabbed his hand and lead him throught the village, hoping to enjoy her date with him and take his mind off his troubles.

Suddenly they felt weird and...

Soon the fighter is reaching her comrade's heights and.......
1222222221111221.title: The Fighting ends up shrinking!

choices: half the height of Zidane and Terra.
at size of a doll compared to Zidane and Terra.
12222222211112212.content:
"Zidane! Tifa is still shrinking!" Terra yells as the fighter gets smaller the esper.

"What!" Zidane said as he turns around and sees the brunette is still getting smaller.

Tifa starts to worry about at how small she will become as the fighter is now near Terra's chest. Zidane runs over to Tifa and is shock to see the fighter still shrinking. Tifa is suprise at how big the world is become and how big Zidane and Terra were becoming.

"I'm sorry about this," Zidane said to the fighter, the brunette wonders what the thief is talking about until Zidane picks up the shrinking Tifa both hands. The fighter blushes at being picked up while Zidane is a bit red too but liked holding Tifa like this.

Terra is surprise that Zidane picked up the shrinking woman but realizes why he did what he did. It was in case Tifa shrink so small, at least he would be able to hold the fighter in his hand. Terra walks next to Zidane and hopes that Tifa's shrinking will start a certain point.

12222222211112212.title: Tifa's shrinking has not stop!

122222222111122122.content:
The shrinking continued until Tifa was like a doll in Zidane's hands. She always had the beauty to be compared to one, and now her size matched. At least, that's what Zidane thought before he remembered that he himself was shrunken as well, making Tifa much smaller than a doll by normal standards. From his viewpoint, the shrunken woman appeared to be only about 6 inches tall. From the look on Tifa's face Zidane could tell that she had not forgotten how small she now was. The tiny brunette had her mouth agape, from seeing her new, bigger surroundings, no doubt.

"This sucks!" The tiniest woman shouted, with an apparent defiance of her new size. She stood up on the giant hand was sitting in and looked around, not bothering to cover herself. "Even that crystal is huge now..." She said quietly to herself.

Zidane was a little shocked upon hearing Tifa's little outburst, but was glad Tifa was not taking her smaller size too badly.

"You can say that again." He smiled wryly at Tifa in his hand. The tiny woman looked up at him for the first time since her shrinking finished, and smiled back at him with a wink.

"You look so huge! But I know it's just me who's small..." Tifa said.

Terra joined the two, standing next to Zidane and casting a big shadow over the shrunken woman. "Oh no, she's so small!" Terra cried, her empathy staying true as she looked at the tiny Tifa with pity, despite being shrunken herself. "But, why did she get so small?"

"I want to know that too! Being this small is going to make fighting a lot tougher!" Tifa shouted.

"I don't know... Maybe it's because she held the crystal for so long?" Zidane offered.

"Hmm... I hope we can figure it out soon. And also find a way to get ourselves back to normal!" Terra said.

All three agreed with that, but what could they do at their sizes?
122222222111122122.title: Unexpectedly small

1222222221111221221.content:
"Let's go and get some help," Zidane suggest after a few seconds of silence between everyone.

"Would that be a good though?" Terra asks felling a bit scared about traveling at this small size.

"I think we should leave, we don't know if the person who plant this trap is around," Tifa said agreeing with Zidane's idea. "Besides it's better then just staying here like sitting ducks,"

"Yes you're right," Terra agree with the plan of getting help. "So where should we go?"

"That's the question isn't," Zidane replies as he thinks about where to go. The thief remembers that Terra and himself come from an area that is beach and knew the way back to it. But the two had to face many of those crystal beings during that trip and he wonders if they were back. "Tifa how was the area you were at? Before you came to this place full pillars?"

"Welll....." Tifa looks at the giant and starts to think for a moment. "It was a forest type area, it should be safe since I took care of enemies in that area,"

"That's good. The path come in should be safe as well," Terra said feeling happy about fighting all of the enemies along the way. "So what path should we take?"

After a few minutes of talking about it, the tiny group picks.....
1222222221111221221.title: Going to look for help but what path?

12222222211112212212.content:
"I think that about settles it then. Let's go back the way Tifa came." Zidane said.

"Uh-huh." Terra agreed with a nod.

"Okay! I'll show you guys the way." Tifa chirped from Zidane's hand.

With Tifa giving Zidane and Terra directions the group made their way out of the pillar area, although it took some time due to the three's reduced sizes. They eventually made it to the forest area where Tifa had come from, the smallest woman being held by Zidane all the while.

"Wow, everything's so big." Zidane said in awe at the trees towering over him.

"Yeah, it's not like before in the pillar room." Terra added. "Seeing these trees so big, and even the grass up to my knees, makes me feel smaller."

"Hah! I wish I didn't know what you meant." Tifa yelled up at her bigger comrades.

"Oh, I'm sorry, Tifa! I didn't mean to make light of your size!" Terra apologized.

"It's okay." Tifa told her with a smile. "I know I'm the smallest one here. I am glad to have you two to help me out though."

"That's right. We'll get through this." Zidane said. "But first, we've got to get through this forest and find some help!"

"Yes. I'm just glad there aren't any animals around here. I couldn't imagine taking on a monster at this size!" Terra said.

Just then, a bush nearby started to rustle. Terra screamed in surprise and jumped back.

"Aaahh!" She cried.

Zidane was also cautious, stepping from the bush as well.

What is it? He wondered.
12222222211112212212.title: Tiny amonst the trees

choices: see that Ashe is holding a shrinking crystal!
122222222111122122121.content:
"That's strange, I thought I heard someone around here," A figure says as they go through the bush.

Zidane, Terra and Tifa in relief seeing it's someone they know, the tower figure is no other then Ashe.

"It's Ashe. We've found someone," Terra said with a smile happy they found some help.

Ashe didn't notice the tiny group near her, the sandy blonde wonders if she was hearing things.

"Yeah. We need to get her attention though," Zidane said as he looks up to the giantess, the thief wonders what they could do.

"Why don't we try jumping?" Tifa asks her taller friends. "Some how in this world we're able to jump as may times as we want,"

"That's true but......" Terra frowns at the next part, "Since we have been reduce to this size our power has weaken as well,"

"Yeah. I feel it too," Zidane confirms about them being weaker, since he did most of his combat in the air in this world he could feel that their jumps wouldn't reach Ashe's face.

"AAAAAGGHH! I can't believe we've become this weak!" Tifa shouts at the sky, the tiniest woman wished she was at lest as tall as Zidane and Terra. The fighter then looks at the giantess. "Looks like we don't have much of a choice, we're gonna to have to climb Ashe,"

"Ooooh. I like that idea," Zidane thought a grin, Ashe is quite the beauty as well and the idea of climbing the giantess great figure. But it also was their only idea for now and it seems like Ashe is standing still for the moment. "Okay. Sounds good. Let's get going,"

"Alright. But we have to be careful and extra careful for Tifa," Terra adds as the Fighter yells.

"I'll just hang to Zidane's hair!"

"Okay. Make to sure to hang on tight," Zidane said with a smile as the group looks at Ashe and.....
122222222111122122121.title: The friendly friend is Ashe.

1222222221111221221211.content:
The group looks at Ashe and begin their climb up the giantess. Ashe usually wore rather long boots, and the group was glad to see that she chose to wear them now, as they made climbing up a bit easier for the two inch tall people, and they made it up her calves in no time.

"Whew! We're almost halfway up her leg already!" Zidane exclaimed. He looked over at Terra, who had managed to keep up the pace so far, which impressed the monkey-boy. "You're doing great, Terra!"

"Thanks, but we've still got a long way to go!" She replied.

Tifa wasn't holding up as well though. The tiniest woman was having a hard time holding onto Zidane's hair, as he kept moving around so much it made it that much harder for her to get a good grip. She was about to say something to him, when Ashe started to move!

"Whoa! Be careful, she's on the move!" Zidane shouted, and held on tighter while Terra did the same. Zidane looked up, trying to figure out what Ashe was up to, and certainly not just to get an upskirt view of her...

"Nothing..." Ashe murmured to herself. "There's no time for this, I have to meet up with someone else."

Ashe's sudden movements threw the shrunken people off balance, every step she took felt like a tremor to them and they struggled to hang on. For how hard Zidane and Terra had it, Tifa was faring far worse, her tinier body had less strength, and as a result her grip on Zidane was weakening with every step Ashe took. It took it's toll far faster than the tiny fighter expected and she felt her hands slipping from Zidane.

"Aaahhh!" Tifa screamed as her grip finally gave out and she fell off of the two inch tall man's head.

"Tifa!" Zidane shouted. He grabbed at the falling shrunken woman, and while he had good reflexes, trying to hold on to Ashe's boot and catch Tifa was just too much for even him. Zidane's hand only ended up grabbing the air as Tifa slipped past him. "No!" He shouted.

Tifa...
1222222221111221221211.title: Oblivious Ashe, falling Tifa

choices: A bush raddles cuasing Ashe to run. Cuasing the tiny group to have trouble.
Ashe stops for a break.  The tiny group has an easier time to climb up Ashe.

Tifa's fall didn't last long as the tiny woman land's on Ashe's boot. Tifa sighs in relief for a moment for not fall of the giantess but the momment didn't last long as the foot Tifa is on starts to move! While Ashe is moving Tifa did the only thing she could do and grabs one of the threads of the boot and hangs on for dear life.

"Danm it," Zidane said as he curse himself for not catching Tifa.

Zidane could tell that Terra is worry about Tifa and he is as well. The theif looks up once and back down and stares at Terra.

"Okay. I'll go get Ashe's attention," ZIdane said as he starts to climb up the giantess, Terra took note that the thief is going faster now since he didn't worry about the incredible tiny Tira. "Good Luck and be Safe!"

Terra smiles at hearing this and shouts back.

"I will. You be careful too," Terra shouts back and starts to climb down and hopes that Tifa is still on the boot.

____________________________

Ashe continue to walk through the forest unaware of the tiny beings that are climbing her. The sandy blonde hopes to find a person to team up or at lest find a crystal that could help them out.

"I hope everyone is doing fine," Ashe thought about the other warriors of light and looks around. "I must do my part to help Cosmos as well. I wonder if there is a crystal around here some where,"

As the she walks the woman looks the area and hopes to find a ally or even crystal in this forest. But sadly luck is not her side as she continues to walk until......
12222222211112212212112.title: Tifa lands on the boot and split up.

choices: Terra lands next to Tifa on Ashe's boot
122222222111122122121121.content:
Ashe heard a rustling noise next to herself, she quickly turned and got into a defensive position, ready to fight if need be. She heard the sound of leaves rustling again, this time she saw that it was coming from a bush. Ashe wondered if there was someone in there.

"Hello..?" She asked cautiously. "Is someone there?"

Suddenly someone jumped out of the bush, startling Ashe so much that she gave up her fighting position and decided to run for it instead. Ashe hadn't even had the chance to see who it was that came out of the bush, but in the split second that she saw the figure she could tell that this person was female, but not whether the woman was friend or foe. Her reason for this was that she had been fighting in battles before, and wasn't sure if she was up for another one so soon. She just wished she could find help or a crystal soon.

"Hey!" She heard the woman call to her, but in her fervor Ashe couldn't tell who the voice belonged to. She did know that there were female villains on the Chaos side of this battle though, so she didn't even bother to look back, instead she just kept running.

Down below on Ashe's boot, all her running was making things even more difficult to climb. Zidane was holding on well enough, even making some slow progress up the giantess. But Terra was having trouble.

The two-inch tall girl was still making her way back down Ashe's boot when the giantess started to run, the sudden jolt of movement nearly knocked her off. Terra had managed to hold on though, but she knew it would be hard to keep it up. She held on tighter for the moment, but she could feel her grip slipping.

Always thinking of others, Terra turned her attention downwards to see if she could see Tifa. She sighed in relief upon seeing the shrunken fighter laying on the bottom of Ashe's boot. Tifa looked to be in a better position than herself, as the fighter had gotten herself in between the boot's laces, which kept her in a snug hold.

I'm coming, Tifa. Terra thought as she redoubled her efforts to climb down the massive boot, summoning every bit of strength to do so. But then, a particularly hard step by Ashe knocked her completely off.

"Aaaahhh!" Terra screamed as she entered a free fall.

Next...
122222222111122122121121.title: Something in the bush

1222222221111221221211212.content:
Terra wasn't out yet though. Quickly regaining herself, Terra used her Esper powers to align herself during her fall, she made a safe landing on the bottom of the boot, next to Tifa, where she shifted back to her human form.

"Terra! You came back!" Tifa shouted.

"Yes. *huff* Of course I did!" Terra replied, almost out of breath.

"Thank you." Tifa said. She then held up a lace for Terra to climb into. "Here. We may be at the bottom of this giantess's body, but it's much safer than it looks."

Terra nodded, and accepted Tifa's offer by holding onto the boot's lace. With herself and Tifa strapped in, she was sure that falling would be impossible from here on.

"So, where's Zidane?" Tifa asked.

"He's still climbing Ashe." Terra answered. "I told him I'd come and get you, so he should just go ahead."

"Good thinking. We only need one person to get Ashe's attention." Tifa smiled. "I just wish she'd stop running already! What's her problem, anyway?"

Ashe had been running for a while now, and she'd made it out of the forest and into the ruins of a castle. She had heard the person in the bush chasing her for a while, and thought she had to run to get away. But now she didn't hear anything.

"That was close." Ashe sighed, wiping the sweat from her brow.

She leaned against a pillar to relax, still oblivious to the tiny people on her body. One of which, Zidane, had made it up to her chest, and couldn't resist having some fun in between her mountains. He was too small to be felt by her, and she was too busy trying to look out for her pursuer to notice.

But then she felt something was amiss.

"Hello, Ashe." Came the female voice from before.

Ashe shot up, standing off of the pillar, and looked around for where this woman was. She turned around and saw her, and that she was...
1222222221111221221211212.title: Terra is safe, but Ashe?

12222222211112212212112122.content:
Ashe saw that her pursuer was none other than the evil Cloud of Darkness! From her lack of clothes and green skin and snakes, and the way she floated just above the floor, Ashe knew that this was the evil being that had tormented her friends Onion Knight and Laguna before, and that there was point in trying to talk her down from a fight.

"Cloud of Darkness!" Ashe shouted, getting into her fighting pose again. As much as she didn't want to fight, Ashe knew she didn't have a choice now.

"Dear little Ashe, how nice to finally make your acquaintance." Cloud of Darkness said. She had her arms up, telling Ashe that she too, was ready to fight.

The two adversaries circled each other for a while, waiting for the right moment to make the first move, or for her enemy to make a false first strike and counter her. It came when Cloud of Darkness lashed her snakes at Ashe, who barely had enough time to jump out of the way of the lightning fast attack. Luckily, this jump was so precise that it didn't knock any of her tiny passengers off her body.

Ashe recovered and saw that she had landed next to the entrance of the ruins, and thought now that it would be a good place to hide, so she ran into the ruins of the castle, and out of Cloud of Darkness's range. It wasn't a very big place inside, Ashe had a good view of pretty much everything the castle had to offer. She didn't think much of it, until she saw something made her think she had a chance of winning this fight.

"Wait a minute, is that..?" Ashe asked herself out loud, approaching the item.

She had seen something in the ruins, but what?
12222222211112212212112122.title: Ashe vs. Cloud of Darkness

choices: No! Ashe gets shrunk as well! Ashe shrinks until she is one inch tall!
Yes. Ashe stops and tries to figure out what is going.
122222222111122122121121221.content:
"It's a crystal!" Ashe thought at seeing the shining gem in the castle. "With this I'll be able to take of Cloud of Darkness,"

The sandy blonde makes her move and stretches out her right hand to grab the crystal and hopes to defeat her opponent.

____________

Once the two inch thief saw that Cloud of Darkness appear he knew that he had to make sure to warn the giantess about the crystal. He didn't have much of a choice but wait in Ashe's mountains until she escape or deaft Cloud of Darkness. Once every thing calm down the thief is able to travel once more, when he is near Ashe's collar bone he hears Ashe's voice.

"Wait a minute, is that.."

Zidane looks back and sees that it's a crystal!

"Oh no! I gotta warn her!" Zidane thought as he knew what he had to do, the thief puts all of his power to jump in front of the giantess and hopes to catch her attention!

Time seem to slow down for the two inch thief as they both more, Ashe reaching out for the crystal while he jumps of her and flies high into the sky. Zidane hopes that Ashe can see him before she even touches the crystal.

Is the two inch Zidane able to get Ashe's attention?
122222222111122122121121221.title: Ashe and the crystal and Zidane's gamble jump

choices: Finding an even smaller Terra and Tifa!
Finding Terra and Tifa at the same heights as before
1222222221111221221211212211.content:
"Ashe, don't touch that crystal!" Zidane shouted.

Ashe grabbed the crystal, never hearing anything more than a squeaking sound by her ear. With the crystal in hand, she took the time to look for the source of the sound. She then saw something small on the pedestal where the crystal had been, what looked to be a tiny person. She got up closer, not noticed yet that the pedestal that had previously been waist-high to her was now directly in front of her face.

"Zidane!?" Ashe exclaimed.

The shrinking woman got a good look at the tiny man to see that it was indeed a tiny Zidane, in the next instant though, her vision was blocked as she dwindled into her own clothes. The freshly shrunken woman next found herself stuck in her own shirt, she struggled to get out of it, and with some effort, she did.

Now buried inside her own clothes, Ashe noticed that at least her shrinking had stopped. She wondered how small she was now. She was still shocked that the crystal had seemingly caused her to shrink, her plan to take the fight to Cloud of Darkness had backfired immensely, and she was now more helpless then even before!

Ashe crawled through her oversized clothing, wondering how she was going to survive this. The shrunken Dalmascan princess eventually made it out of her clothing, popping her head out of the darkness she could see for the first time just how big the world had become. She remembered Zidane on the pedestal, and looked up to see if she could see him, but it was no use, he was too high for her to see.

"Are you okay, princess?" Came Zidane's voice from behind Ashe, startling her a little.

Ashe turned around and saw Zidane standing there, completely naked, just like herself. Ashe blushed as she saw all of him, and at being seen herself. The shrunken princess didn't cover herself though, knowing that he'd be seeing it soon anyway, since they had to run and hide from Cloud of Darkness. Ashe also noticed that Zidane was twice her size, she wondered how small that made her.

"I'm okay. I'd like an explanation of what's going on here, but right now, we need to get out of here! Cloud of Darkness is coming!" Ashe told Zidane with urgency.

"Yeah, I know. But we need to find Terra and Tifa first." Zidane replied.

"Terra and Tifa are here too? Did they shrink as well?" Ashe asked.

"Yeah. C'mon, they're probably still underneath your clothes, help me look for them!" Zidane said.

Ashe nodded. She didn't know what was going on, or how she and the others got so small, but she knew Cloud of Darkness was going to be here any minute, so finding her friends and helping them to safety took priority for her. Ashe and Zidane looked through her clothes...
1222222221111221221211212211.title: Ashe shrinks

choices: Zidane and Ashe go through the hole and find a safe place to take a break.
Cloud of Darkness stops they tiny group before they enter the hole!
12222222211112212212112122111.content:
Zidane and Ashe walk toward one of the gigantic boots. It amaze Ashe at how small she is right now, she could even live in her own boot!

"Okay. That last time I saw them was near you boots," Zidane said as the reach the boots.

"Why would they be there?" Ashe asks as she starts her search for her friends in her skirt.

"We were climbing you to get your attention," Zidane answers back as he searches on near the boot.

"You were!?" Ashe surprise from hearing this and remembers all the moment she did. "I'm so sorry. I must have caused a lot trouble for you,"

"It's okay," Zidane replies to one inch woman. "I'm sorry that I didn't make it in time to warn you,"

"That's okay. Let's just fine Terra and Tifa and out of here," Ashe replies back wanting to make Zidane feel better.

Before Zidane could say anything back to Dalmascan princess, Until looks on the boot sees something that shocks him! He had a feeling this could happen but he hoped that it didn't, the once near his size Terra is now even smaller! The esper is now looks five inches to the two inch Zidane, he slowly puts his hand out near the smaller woman. In a few seconds he sees Terra jump on his hand and he slowly pulls his right hand near his face.

"Are you alright?" Zidane asks the the tiny woman on his had. It feels so surreal that he is at two inches while Terra looks so tiny to him.

"I'm okay! Tifa is here as well!" Terra yells back to the "giant". The esper has her right palm out indicating that the fighter is on it.
_____

Tifa could hardly say anything, at first Terra and herself were hanging onto Ashe's laces and wait for Zidane to get to Dalmascan princess attention. The for some reason the two of them were shrinking again! If it wasn't for Terra grabbing her Tifa would lost in the threads of Ashe's boot! Then when Zidane came over pick up Terra, Tifa finally realize how small she truly is, Terra who once was about Zidane height is now being held by giant of two inches of height! And to Tifa, Zidane's face is her new sky, the fighter couldn't see anything pass the thief.

______

Zidane's heart sunk, If Terra look so small to him that would mean that Tifa is.....

"I'm so sorry," Zidane apologizes to the two woman on his hand he couldn't believe this could happen. If only he ran faster or maybe not take time to mess around he could possible have prevented this from happening.

"Did you find them?" Ashe asks as the one inch woman walks over to Zidane, the thief didn't say anything as he turns around uses his free hand to point at the palm of his hand.

"Y-You don't mean," Ashe figuring what Zidane is getting at, Zidane's face is all the sandy blonde needs to know that their two friends shrunken even more. Dalmaacan princess slowly walks over and looks at Zidane palm and sees the tinier Terra. "I'm sorry. If I didn't pick up that crystal then you two would not be that small,"

________

Tifa could tell that her two friends feel guilty about what happen to Terra and herself. The fighter then looks at Terra and knew the esper wants to make the two larger members of the group feel better.

"Terra! I need to tell them something for me!" Tifa yells as loud as she could.

Terra could hear friend and nod and listen to the smaller woman.

________

Zidane and Ashe wonder what is going on the thief palm and before they could ask they hear a yell from the tinier esper.

"It's not your fault! We knew the risk when when tried to climb Ashe to get her attention!" Terra for a bit as she listens to fighter in her hand. "You also saved us! If didn't come to look for us we would be trap on the boot forever! That's what Tifa and I think!"

"Thanks," Zidane chuckles normally he would be the one trying to make a person happy, but seeing that Terra and Tifa still hanging onto hope made him perk up. Yeah it's not over until it's over,"

"Yes. We just need to find a way or find someone that can help you," Ashe adds feeling better from Terra and Tifa's speech. "Thank you you are too kind," Ashe then bows to the smaller women on the thief's hand.

Terra and Tifa could blush at seeing a princess of a kingdom bow to them, they could feel Ashe's appreciation towards them.

"Okay. I think it's time we make our leave. Don't want her to find us," Zidane said as Ashe gets up the one inch woman nods in agreement. "There's a hole in the wall, let's go into that,"

"Alright. Let's hurry," Ashe agrees and two start to walk over to the hole in the wall.

Terra and Tifa wonder who they are talking about, but stay quite and wait until they are safe to ask the two larger people.
12222222211112212212112122111.title: Finding an even smaller Terra and Tifa!

choices: Cloud of Darkness picks up the crystal
Cloud of Darkness takes the shrunken people captive
122222222111122122121121221112.content:
Cloud of Darkness followed Ashe into the ruins, taking her time to savor the chase. Floating her way across the floor, she entered into the main room. She didn't see any sign of Ashe, at first that is, until she spotted Ashe's clothes laying on the floor. She hovered over to them.

"What's this? Has the princess taken to streaking?" She asked out loud, thinking that if Ashe was merely hiding, the princess would hear her taunting and make a sound or something to give away her position.

But Cloud of Darkness didn't hear anything. She stay still and scanned the room, pondering what was going on here. She couldn't imagine Ashe had gone far, but she wondered why Ashe had left her clothes behind. She then noticed some tiny figures that seemed to be running across the floor near Ashe's pile of clothes.

Intrigued, Cloud of Darkness hovered over them, casting a big shadow over the tiny creatures, who seemed to move even faster now. The wicked being took a closer look at them and was surprised to see that the tiny creatures were none other than shrunken warriors of light! She couldn't help but laugh at these pitiful creatures, and when she noticed that her previous prey, Ashe, was amongst them, she laughed even harder.

"Hahaha! How pitiful!" She mocked the tiny people. She then noticed that the shrunken people seemed to be headed for a hole in the wall, to hide, she figured. She knew how to put an end to that though.

___

"It's Cloud of Darkness, run!" Ashe had shouted as soon as the fiend's shadow was cast over them. Neither her nor Zidane noticed Cloud of Darkness enter the room before, she thought she'd have heard her coming at least, but then remembered that Cloud of Darkness preferred to float, giving her the edge in stealth. She sped up her running speed to get to the hole in the wall, thinking that if she and Zidane could make it, then they would have the stealth advantage. "Hurry!" She shouted again.

Zidane didn't have to be told twice, he picked up the pace as well. They were so close to the hole, to safety.

But just before they made it there, Zidane and Ashe were lifted up into the air by Cloud of Darkness's powers. Zidane made sure to keep Terra and Tifa safe as they were lifted up into the air. The tiny people were soon brought before Cloud of Darkness's massive, smirking face.

"Ashe.. and Zidane as well." Cloud of Darkness's voice boomed. It was loud to Zidane, but he wondered how much worse it must be for Terra and especially Tifa. "You two seem to have gotten yourselves shrunken somehow. Tell me, how did this happen to you?"

"Let us go, you big jerk!" Zidane shouted.

Cloud of Darkness sighed. She then shuffled Zidane into her hand, keeping Ashe afloat.

"H-Hey..!" Zidane exclaimed, not liking being tossed around in the air like this.

Cloud of Darkness ignored him, she then squeezed his body tightly, causing the shrunken man to writhe and scream out in pain.

"Aaaghh!" He cried. But through his pain, his only thoughts were keeping the tinier Terra and even tinier Tifa safe, holding them in such a way that they wouldn't get hurt by the squeezing hand.

Cloud of Darkness let up after a few seconds of this, making Zidane's battered body float in front of herself once again.

"Wait!" Ashe suddenly cried out. "I'll tell you! It was the crystal!"

"The crystal?" Cloud of Darkness asked. She saw a crystal next to Ashe's empty clothes. "This?" She asked, looking at the crystal intently.

Is this some plan by Chaos and the others? She wondered. If they've been planning something behind my back...

Next...

12222222211112212212112122111211.content:
"N-No!" Cloud of Darkness shouted in anger. She glared at the smaller people in the room, who seemed to shrink even further under her gaze. She reached out to crush them in her hands, but as she did, she felt her power over them fade. the spell that held them in the air was weakening, lowering them slowly to the floor. Cloud of Darkness swiped at them anyway in her anger, but they had fallen just under her reach and she ended up just grabbing air.

Damn them! Those worms tricked me! Cloud of Darkness thought as she watched them fall all the way to the floor. She'd have her revenge soon though, she thought, as long as she crushed them quickly and before she got too small, she'd have nothing to worry about.

Down on the floor, Zidane and Ashe were happy to see that the plan had worked and Cloud of Darkness was now shrinking, but the fight wasn't won yet, Cloud of Darkness still had the size advantage over them, although it was steadily decreasing. The tiny two knew they just had to keep away from the shrinking giantess long enough for her to shrink down to their size, or maybe even smaller.

"Okay, Ashe, here's the plan, you take care of Terra and Tifa, and I'll distract the big broad!" Zidane said.

"But what if you get hurt?" Ashe asked.

"Don't worry, I'll be fine!" Zidane said with a smile.

"... Alright." Ashe replied.

Zidane handed Terra to Ashe, who gently held the smaller woman in her hand. A moment later Ashe saw that Terra seemed distraught about something, and not just their still huge, albeit still shrinking, foe. Terra seemed to have been searching for something, a second later the tinier woman looked up Ashe.

"Tifa's missing!" Terra shouted. "She must've landed somewhere around here after we fell!"

Ashe gasped. "Tifa's missing?!" Ashe shouted.

Zidane heard the commotion. "Tifa's missing!?" He asked.

Ashe looked at him. "Yes, Terra said she must've fallen off during our fall, she must be somewhere around here, I'll look!" She said.

"Okay, but try to stay away from Cloud of Darkness!"

Ashe ran off to look for Tifa, and avoid Cloud of Darkness's rage. The villainess in question was just getting ready to fight back against her smaller opponents, she had caught up to Zidane, only at half her size by now and still rapidly shrinking, she slammed her foot on the tiny man. She smirked, thinking she had got her prey, but then yelped out in pain when she felt something hit her ankles. She looked down and saw that Zidane had survived the attack.

"You little pests don't know when to give up, do you?" She said.

"Ha! I'm not alone, I'll never give up! No matter how big you are!" Zidane retorted.

Cloud of Darkness shook Zidane off her foot and tried to stomp him again, but the shrunken man proved too fast, he dodged her foot. She tried again, and again, but each time he had narrowly dodged her attacks. Eventually though, it got to the point where he was dodging her easily, she then realized that she had shrunken so small that simply stomping on him wasn't going to work.

She thought to change up her attack strategy, but as she did, she had a sudden burst of shrinking, leaving Cloud of Darkness eye-to-eye with her formerly tiny opponent. Zidane smirked, knowing victory was well within reach.

"Not so big now, are you? Zidane mocked her.

"I don't need to be bigger to win!" Cloud of Darkness shouted.

Cloud of Darkness flung her hand up, sending her attack snakes at Zidane. He easily dodged the attack though, and countered with a high kick, aiming for her head to end this fight quickly. But his attack came up short, or rather, Cloud of Darkness did. The villainess was horrified to see that she was still shrinking! She was now smaller than Zidane.

"Well, this is unexpected!" Zidane smirked. "But I'm not complaining."

Zidane went in to grab the now smaller being, but Cloud of Darkness managed to snap out of her shock just in time to launch a blast attack.

"Agh!" Zidane moaned.

He wasn't hurt by the blast though, it had done little more than conjure up some smoke. He waved the smoke away from his face, and when it cleared, he saw that Cloud of Darkness was now far away from him, and she was laying on the ground, she seemed to be in more pain than he was! He guessed that her own attack was the reason for this, he grinned at the thought.

"What's the matter, you're attacks are even backfiring now?" Zidane laughed.

Cloud of Darkness pulled herself to her feet, wiping away the damage from her body. She felt that her shrinking had finally stopped, she estimated her height to be that of a doll to Zidane, or Ashe, she wasn't exactly sure, but she knew that she was extremely small and that she needed to do something to turn this fight around or she was as good as dead!

Blast! He's right though, my magic is betraying me... Cloud of Darkness thought.

Zidane was about to rush in and finished this fight for real, but he stopped when he saw something else in the distance. Something that looked like Tifa. He squinted his eyes to be sure, there was no doubt about it, it was Tifa alright. He had found her at last, she was laying on the floor, unconscious. But she was behind Cloud of Darkness. Zidane was worried what would happen if the villainess got her hands on Tifa, so he rushed to her side, ignoring Cloud of Darkness for the moment.

Cloud of Darkness saw Zidane's reaction to something behind her, so she looked behind and saw the even smaller fighter laying on the floor. Even from where she was, Cloud of Darkness could tell that Tifa was smaller than herself. Thinking this to be her ace in hole against her larger opponents, Cloud of Darkness raced to the smaller woman, thinking to take her hostage and have the tinier woman help make her escape.

Zidane was bigger and faster, but Cloud of Darkness was closer to the tinier Tifa. Who gets to her first?

Lightning had been walking along the shore of the beach for only a little while when she saw someone coming her way. She could tell they were small like her, so she thought it might be one of her allies. Not caring if this person was a friend or foe, she figured she'd be able to handle them either way, she approached the mystery person, not even caring if they saw her in the nude. Once she made it to them, she pounded on their leg. That got their attention, she looked up at the person she had tried to the attention of, she couldn't really tell before since she was too far away, but now she saw that it was Zidane.

"Zidane!?" Lightning shouted.

"L-Lightning!" Zidane stammered to say, surprised, and disappointed, to see his friend had already been shrunken. He looked away to let the woman keep some modesty.

"So, you shrunk too." Lightning stated, her regular composure returned. "Don't worry. You can look, I don't care. Besides, I can see all of you too, you know."

Zidane blushed a deeper shade of red at Lightning forwardness. He looked down at her, and saw that she only came up to his knees. The tiny woman was much smaller than he was, only about a fourth his size at half an inch tall. He tried not to stare, although true to her word, Lightning didn't seem to mind. Then he suddenly remembered what Cloud of Darkness had told him about the Chaos side sending one of its warriors after Lightning.

"Be careful, Lightning! I heard Chaos is sending their warriors after us! One might be here soon!" Zidane warned her. He got into a fighting position, but Lightning didn't seem worried.

"Yeah. They sent Exdeath after me. He's over there." Lightning points to across the beach.

Zidane looks and sees Exdeath was indeed over there, but he was lying on the sand, unconscious from the looks of it.

"He wasn't a problem." Lightning said with a matter-of-fact tone. But then sounded more annoyed with her next sentence, "It was after I beat him that I grabbed that damn crystal and ended up like this!"

"W-Wow. That's a heck of a story. I'm glad you're safe though, all things considered." Zidane said.

"Yeah, well, I left the crystal over there if you want to take a look." Lightning offered.

"That's okay, but these crystals only shrink whoever touches them." Zidane explained.

"Hmph. That's unfortunate. I thought there might be a way to grow." Lightning said, annoyed.

"Not as far as we know, but who knows? I think we'll find a way eventually." Zidane said, hopeful about the situation. He was sad to see Lightning shrunken, but now that he knew she was okay he was glad for that much.

"We?" Lightning asked.

"Oh yeah, Ashe and Terra, and even Tifa are here." Zidane replied.

"Tifa's here? That's good news." Lightning said.

"Well, she's smaller than the others..." Zidane said. Lightning looked at him confused, she wondered how anyone could be smaller than herself. Zidane smiled and said, "Come on, I'll show you."

Lightning nodded and followed Zidane back to Ashe and the others.
1222222221111221221211212211121121122112.title: They were too late, Lightning already shrunk!

An enemy is walk about with a bottle in hand that is holding Ashe and the others

It didn't take long for the two to get back to Ashe and the others resting spot.

"Ashe! I'm back and I have some good news and some bad," Zidane said as Lighting and himself stop. The two wait for a response but Ashe did not reply back to them.

"Are sure this is where you left them?" Lighting asks the taller young man.

Along the way Zidane help Lighting by holding some of blade of grass up so she could get through with no trouble. And after more time looking around the area the two become warn out, Zidane from getting hurt when Cloud of Darkness and dodging all of her attack when the viillainess was shrinking plus with all of the running he did today is quite the strain the thief's body. Even though Lighting didn't show it the solider feels quite tired from her fight with Exdeath and from running as well.

"I hope they're safe," Lighting thought as she and Zidane both stop to take a breather. Zidane also had the same thoughts as well and wonders if he could get a better view if he climb the tallest blade of grass and hopes he could see Ashe.

"I'm going to get a better view. I'll be right back," ZIdane said as he chooses to put his plan into action. Lighting nods and the thief climbs the tallest blade of grass near him.

It didn't take long for ZIdane to get to the top and when he looks in the distance and sees....
1222222221111221221211212211121121122112.title: Ashe and the others are missing!

choices: Zidane and Lightning catch up with Ultimecia
Ashe, Terra and Tifa come up with a way to escape
1222222221111221221211212211121121122112.content:
To Zidane's surprise he saw Ultimecia, the time traveling Chaos warrior, was several yards away from his and Lightning's position. The giantess villain was walking away from this point. Zidane sighed in relief, thinking that it was a good thing she hadn't come over to him and Lightning.

But then, as he watched her leave, he saw that Ultimecia was holding something in her hand. The villainess was carrying a bottle, and inside it looked like there was a tiny, shrunken person in there. Zidane gasped as he realized that it was Ashe!

Zidane figured that Ultimecia must've come and taken Ashe away while he was with Lightning. It was strange to think how fast that altercation must've been, but the proof was right in front of him. Zidane only hoped that Terra and Tifa were with Ashe and safe.

Zidane then jumped down to Lightning.

"What is it?" Lightning asked, she could see that Zidane was worried.

"It's Ultimecia! She's got Ashe in a bottle!" Zidane told her. "We need to hurry and catch up!"

Lightning nodded in agreement, but Zidane knew the smaller woman would only slow him down.

"I'm sorry." He started. "But if we're going to make it in time I need to carry you."

"You're kidding." Lightning retorted.

Zidane's response came in the form of him picking up the smaller woman and throwing her on his back. Instinctively Lightning held on, she groaned as she settled and the two made their way towards the bad guy.

___

Ashe was sitting in her glass prison, it was humiliating to be taken so easily. If only she had seen that fiend sneak up behind her! But as it was, Ashe could nothing to escape, she had tried plenty already, but at her size there was little she could really do. The little bit of solace she had was that at least she had held onto Terra and Tifa, and by extension Cloud of Darkness.

"Don't worry, Ashe." Terra told Ashe from her hand. "We'll get out of here! I'm sure Zidane is on his way with Lightning right now."

"I hope so." Ashe replied to her smaller friend.

"Yeah, and Tifa here says that she thinks Lightning is probably still normal size, so she'll beat Ultimecia easily!" Terra chimed.

Ashe smiled at Terra and Tifa's optimism. But then her world started to shake.

"Quiet down in there!" Ultimecia's voice boomed from above the bottle prison. The giantess had shook the bottle to shut up her new finds, once they were adequately quiet, she scoffed at them. "Hmph. And to think I'd be as lucky as this and find you on my way to my target, already shrunken down."

Ashe was glad to hear this little tidbit of information Ultimecia had inadvertently revealed. If she understood right, then the witch was on her way to shrink another Warrior of Cosmos. She wondered who it might be. Ashe looked down to see Terra seemed to be thinking the same thing, but she didn't want to talk to her too much, since Ultimecia was not aware of the smaller girls' presence yet, and Ashe wanted to keep it that way.

Next...

Ultimecia sees her target before Zidane and Lighting think up a plan.

Zidane chuckles at hearing this.

"Hey I got to keep the ladies on their toes!" The young man replies back and adds with seriously in his voice. "There's just no way I can ignore someone in trouble and besides we a team. A team doesn't abandon member no matter what,"

Lighting only let hmph but there seem to be something genuine and good nature about.

"Okay. But you have to rest once we save Ashe and the others," Lighting adds. "Don't want you to dragging us down,"

"Oh my showing your soft huh Lighting," Zidane thought with a bit of a grin, he then says. "Alright I take a break once we save Ashe and the others,"

Zidane continues to run though the blades of grass, seeing that's he is getting near the giantess he starts to make sure that she can't see him. Zidane knew he had to think of plan before going in and facing the giantess. He could see that Ashe and the others are still danger since they are still being held in the bottle and plus it looks like Ultimecia holding on it quite well.

"No. Not yet," Zidane whispers back hoping that him or Lighting can come up with a plan to help Ashe and the others.

1222222221111221221211212211121121122112.content:
"Ugh." Lightning groaned at Zidane's incompetence. "Listen, I've got something."

"Lay it on me." Zidane said.

"Okay. I'm thinking we have to do this quick, so do you see how low she's holding the bottle?" Lightning pointed ahead to Ultimecia's comparative giantess form. It was true, the witch had her arm hanging by her side. "Well, I bet you could climb up her dress just high enough to get me in a position to jump to the bottle. If I'm right, you won't be big enough to be felt by her."

"Okay. Yeah, I think I can do that." Zidane agreed.

"Good. Once I'm on the bottle, I'll do something to Ultimecia's hand and, hopefully, make her drop it. Once it hits the ground it should smash open, if it does I'll grab Ashe and get out of there as fast as possible." Lightning explained.

"What if the bottle doesn't break?" Zidane asked.

Lightning gulped. "I'll have to improvise. Actually, I might need your help to open the bottle."

"That sounds risky, we'd have to move fast. Ultimecia isn't not going to hear or feel us once your on the bottle." Zidane stated.

"Yeah. That's why we have to do this quick." Lightning said. "Are you ready?"

"Sure. Let's do it!" Zidane shouted. "Let's go!"

Lightning smiled, happy to hear Zidane's determination.

Zidane picked up the pace, catching up to the giantess in no time. The giantess form of Ultimecia was a powerful force to witness, as Zidane got closer to her he could feel each of her footsteps shake the ground a little. Zidane was struggling to keep pace, even though the giantess wasn't moving very fast. Ultimecia didn't seem like she was going to stop walking anytime soon, so Zidane knew he had to take a risk. When he felt the time was right he leapt up onto the leg of Ultimecia's dress.

"Hold on!" Zidane told Lightning as he made the jump.

He felt Lightning grab onto him tighter, pressing more of herself into his back. Zidane then grabbed out and held on tight himself, on to Ultimecia's dress. He thought it'd be easier now that he was holding onto her, but Ultimecia's constant stepping made holding on a tough thing to do, somehow this was harder then when he was Ashe!

Zidane redoubled his efforts and started his ascent. On the way up, he looked up at the bottle holding Ashe and the others, they hadn't seen him yet, but seeing them made him more determined then ever to rescue them.

"Wait, here's good!" Lightning shouted to him as he kept climbing.

"Here?!" Zidane asked. "Are you sure you don't to go higher?"

"Yeah, I can make it." Lightning assured him.

"Okay. If you say so, I'll trust you!" Zidane shook his head.

Zidane halted his ascent of the giantess and held on tightly to her dress, thankful she hadn't seemed to notice his presence yet. Lightning braced herself for the acrobatics she was about to do, she took a few deep breaths.

"Lightning?" Zidane asked.

Lightning didn't reply, instead she took her chance and jumped off of Zidane's back, flying through the air until finally, she reached the bottle. Her amazing jump had landed her right on the side of the lid of the bottle, and through Ultimecia's huge fingers. She was slumped down for a while, looking down at the brown lid, she couldn't see Ashe or the others from up here, so she simply stood up and recovered.

"Good work! I'll climb down now!" Zidane shouted to her.

Lightning nodded towards him. Then she got to work, attacking Ultimecia's huge fingers. Hit after hit until the giantess finally let up, then Lightning quickly ran to the next finger and, before Ultimecia's other finger could recover, delivered a strong blow.

"Ow!" Ultimecia's voice boomed. The giantess stopped in her tracks to look down at the disturbance at her hand, but in her moment of weakness, she dropped the bottle she was carrying and it...

Before Ashe could look behind her, the sandy blond sees that they are about to hit the ground! Ashe knows she has to act quickly and cast a protect spell on her self and the others hopping that it protect them from the crash and glass shards. Lighting knows that the giantess is being serious, the pink hair woman knew that she has to get away fast or she would be killed. "All we need to do is escape the big bad witch and reunite with Ashe!" Zidane shouts to Lightning.

"Right. You want to jump for it?" Lightning asks.

Zidane looks down for a moment and sees how far the drop would be, he's pretty sure he can make it, he just hopes that the smaller Lightning can handle the fall. "Yeah, okay! Let's do it!" He replies anyway.

"Okay, I'll follow your lead! Say when!" Lightning shouts.

"Ready now?" Zidane asks her with a smile.

Lightning nods. With that, the two jump off of Ultimecia's giantess form and fall to the ground. They hit the ground hard, but amazingly they are not hurt by the fall. The two shrunken heroes recover quickly, and shoot off into the tall grass which provides them with some decent cover.

"Do you think you can get away that easily?" Ultimecia taunts the tiny people.

Ultimecia stomps the patch of grass that Zidane and Lightning ran into, she smirks as she feels her foot crushing something, but when she raises her foot she sees that it was just a bug. Ultimecia groans. She thinks that finding her shrunken enemies is going to be a little tougher than she initially thought. The grassy plains around her were higher than average, so when Zidane and Lightning ran into it Ultimecia had lost sight of them. The witch wasn't about to be beaten by such small foes though, she charged up a magic spell to burn the grass away.

"Firaga!" Ultimecia chanted, thrusting her arms outwards.

Fire then appeared out of nowhere and onto the grassy plains, which quickly caught on fire and burned the whole place to ash. Ultimecia looked over the chaotic flames she had caused and, when they dissapaited moments later, spotted Zidane and Lightning along with Ashe. The three tiny people seemed to be perfectly fine. (They had a shell spell from Ashe to thank for that).

But where exactly were they?
1222222221111221221211212211121121122112.title: Out of the frying pan and into the fire

Someone shows up to fight Ultimecia
1222222221111221221211212211121121122112.content:
Zidane and Lightning had met up with Ashe shortly after running into the grass, they explained the situation to her quickly and then she joined them in making their escape from Ultimecia. The shrunken group found some potential shelter when they found a small cave nearby. But as they got closer the grass around them suddenly burnt up in flames!

Ashe, reacting quickly and realizing that this had to be because of a spell, cast a shell spell to protect herself and her friends from the fire spell. It worked and the shrunken people were safe while the grass burned around them. They stayed huddled together until the fire wore down. Once the fire settled, they ran off for the small cave again.

"There you are!" Came the shouts of Ultimecia.

The giantess witch ran after the tiny people, but they were too fast for her. Zidane and Ashe made it into the cave just in time. Ultimecia lunged at the shrunken heroes, but just narrowly missed them as they ran into the small cave. The witch snarled and got back up. The cave was far too small for any normal sized person to fit in, it was also part of a decent sized rock, one that Ultimecia could see all of from her viewpoint, this allowed her to see any possible exits, making escape difficult for Zidane and the shrunken girls.

"Very well. Hide in your pathetic little hole. It shall be your grave." Ultimecia told them. She would watch and wait for them to come out, and when they did she would finish them off.

Inside the cave, it was dark and damp, but had ample room for the tiny people to move around. The problem was that there was only one way in or out of the cave.

"Dang it! Ultimecia's got us trapped!" Zidane said in anger.

"Hold on. There must be another way out of here." Ashe offered, looking around the dark cave.

"Look around you, there's only one way out and Ultimecia is guarding it!" Zidane said.

"Damn. You know she's just going to wait for us to come out." Lightning said.

"Lightning, welcome to the group." Ashe said to her smaller new friend. "I'm sorry we couldn't meet under better circumstances."

"Yeah. Thanks." Lightning said. She went over to Ashe and looked at her hand, she could see Terra down there, but Tifa was a little too small to make out clearly, even at her size. "And from you told me before, I take it Tifa's down there somewhere?" She asked with some concern.

"Yes..." Ashe said softly.

"Tch." Lightning turned her head to the side. "This just keeps getting better."

"Alright, already. I'm sorry about freaking out a little before." Zidane said. "We need to figure out how to get of here safely, alright?"

"Yes. Do you have any ideas?" Ashe asked.

"I don't know, I'm trying to think of something..." Zidane replied.

"We should just go out there and kick her ass!" Lightning shouted.

"Ha. I like your determination, Lightning!" Zidane laughed. "But I think fighting her should be our last resort."

"I agree with Zidane." Ashe added. "My magic's run out after that last spell I used, so we wouldn't even have that on our side."

"Tch." Lightning said. She paced around impatiently.

Next...

Ultimecia lets out a cry and the woman villian turns around to see if she could find the person that fired the fire spell.

"Great. The light warrior I was suppose to attack is here already!" Ultimecia thought as as she tries to remember who she is meant to attack.

_____________

While the tiny group tries to make a plan, Zidane takes a peek and sees that Ultimecia is not paying attention to them! This could be the perfect chance to escape! The thief is about to tell the others until he sees a fire ball heading for Ultimecia. The time witch is able to hit the fire ball back. Zidane then to the others.

"I have good news, Ultimecia is distract with a fight," Zidane said to the others.

"Good. We could use this time to escape," Lighting suggest feeling like this would be perfect chance to run.

"But what if it's an ally fighting Ultimecia?" Terra asks the taller members of the group.

"That's correct," Ashe adds figuring that the person that Ultimecia is fighting might be the one who the time which is meant to attack.

"Tifa says we should wait and see who it is before we leave," Terra talks for the tinier fighter.

"Okay. Let's see it is first," Zidane agreeing with Tifa's suggestion. The thief is quite curious about who is fighting the giantess as well. Lighting sighs but knew it would be nice to have normal size ally on their side.

1222222221111221221211212211121121122112.title: Ultimecia's targer shows up and attacks.

1222222221111221221211212211121121122112.content:
It was Dagger AKA Garnet, the princess of Alexandria, a kingdom in the world both her and Zidane were from. The orange and white-clad summoner had used Ifrit to attack Ultimeica with its fireball attack.

"Ah, Dagger, so nice to see you!" Ultimecia launches a spell of her own at the end of her sentence, the ice spell hits Ifrit directly, defeating the summon.

Dagger starts to sweat now that Ifrit is gone. She wonders just how powerful this witch really is if she can take down Ifrit in one hit.

"Ultimecia, just what were doing here? You seem interested in that little cave there." Dagger asks. She recalls how some of the Cosmos warriors were talking about some of their fellow warriors going missing, she wonders if Ultimecia might have anything to do with it.

But Ultimecia doesn't give her an answer. Instead the witch casts another ice spell, this time aimed at Dagger herself!

"Blizzaga!" Ultimecia chants, creating several large ice spears in the air, with a flick of her hand they fly at Dagger.

Dagger grunts and jumps out of the way. She dodges most, but cries out in pain when one of the spears knicks her leg. Dagger casts a healing spell on herself and gets ready to fight again.

As the fight between Dagger and Ultimecia raged on. A tiny thief was ecstatic to see that his beloved princess was now here, he and Ashe watched the fight from inside the cave.

"It's Dagger!" Zidane tells the group.

"She's a friend of yours right? Ashe asks Zidane, who nods a yes.

"I see. How's she doing?" Lightning asks.

"She's doing fine! Of course she is!" Zidane cheers.

Dagger was indeed holding her own against Ultimecia, turning the tables on the villainess who thought she would be easy pickings. But as the fight continued the witch proved to be a formidable foe for the young summoner...

choices: Zidane and the others start their journey to Dagger.
Dagger finds a crystal near Ultimecia!

Dagger could feel herself get tire from fighting the witch, the young summoner knew that she had to finish this fight and make it quickly. Dagger doges Ultimecia's blizzard spell once more.

"Shell," Dagger said as the summon puts a wall of energy around herself.

"Hmph. You think that magic is the only weapon I have have," Ultimecia retorts and the time witch runs towards the summoner.

Dagger knew what she had to do, Dagger then starts to chant and hopes that this summon can beat Ultimecia for once and for all! Ultimecia sees this and just smirks, the time witch sees that Dagger is an easy target now! When Ultimecia is about three feet near the summoner, Dagger hen shouts.

"Judgment Bolt!

A lighting staff is fall from the sky and is aiming for the time witch, Ultimecia senses the lighting and dodges it and smirks at the summoner. Before Ultimecia can move a shock wave comes out of the staff and shocks the time witch! Ultimecia lets out a loud cry and after few minutes of being electrocuted the time witch falls down and stops moving.

Dagger sighs in relief seeing that Ultimecia is knocked out. The summoner gets to closer to unconscious woman starts to look around to see if she could find anything.

_____________________

"Yeah! Dagger did it!" Zidane yells happily seeing that Dagger beat Ultimecia.

"That's good," Ashe add please as well to see that their ally beat a warrior of Chaos of well.

"I think it's time we get her attention," Lighting suggesting even showing a bit a smiling seeing Dagger beating the female villain.

"Okay. Let's go," Zidane agrees wanting to see Dagger along with a little pervert thoughts about their ally giantess body.
1222222221111221221211212211121121122112.title: Dagger uses Judgment Bolt and it supper effective!

1222222221111221221211212211121121122112.content:
Dagger, having noticed Ultimecia's interest in the small cave before, goes over to examine it. It doesn't look special from the outside. But then Dagger sees two tiny people come out of the cave. The sight shocks the girl, who gasps at seeing these tiny people. She then sees that they seem to be trying to get her attention, so she hesitantly gets closer to them, and when shes does, she can finally make them out in more detail. She gasps again when she sees that the tiny people were actually Ashe and Zidane, and that there's a smaller third person as well who she sees as Lightning.

"Zidane!?" Dagger exclaims.

"It's me, Dagger!" Zidane replies, he's shouting, but to Dagger his voice is quite low.

"Terra and Tifa are here too! And Cloud of Darkness, who we've taken captive!" Ashe shouts, holding up her hand. "They're much smaller than us though!"

Dagger is still too surprised by the whole thing to understand what Ashe means, but she figures that there's someone even smaller than Zidane and her on her hand. Dagger is taken aback by seeing Zidane and the others so small, and she now notices that they are all naked as well which makes Dagger blush. She stands up to her full height and looks away from them. Seeing Dagger at her full height, standing tall over them, makes the shrunken people feel safe somehow, it wasn't like when their enemies at towered over them as they knew Dagger was trustworthy and kind. Zidane in particular is excited from seeing his beloved princess from this point of view, he wonders how "soft" she might be now. But right now, she had to take some time to let this settle in.

"So this is what they've been doing..." Dagger says softly. She realized now that the missing Cosmos warriors were being shrunken by their enemies, and she can hardly believe such a dastardly plan was in play by Chaos. She looks down at her shrunken friends with compassion. "I'm sorry this happened to you all. I wish I had been with you sooner. I can only imagine how hard your journey must've been to this point."

"Don't worry about it!" Zidane shouts. "You're here now and we're all safe! That's all that matters!"

"Now stop being so bashful and give us a hand!" Lightning shouts, but the giantess can't hear her.

"Lightning! Don't be ungrateful!" Ashe scolds her.

"What's the matter?" Dagger asks, still refusing to look at the tiny people.

"Lightning says thanks for helping us!" Zidane tells her quickly, earning him a glare from Lightning. "And that it's okay to look at us!"

"Huh?" Dagger asks, blushing a little more. She slowly turns her head, but eventually is able to look at the shrunken people. "S-So... how did you all get like this?"

"The crystals!" Ashe shouts. "Chaos set up fake ones to shrink us Cosmos warriors!"

"The crystals? I thought something like that might be the case." Dagger says, she then seems to ponder something.

Throwing caution to the wind, Jihl pulls out another shrinking crystal from her stash to throw at Dagger. Jihl is confident at first, but then feels a strange sensation in her body, in an instant she realizes that her plan has backfired!
Her target is surprised to see Jihl still has fight left in her, and moreso that Jihl had another shrinking crystal to use. Dagger's surprise is quickly replaced by amusement as she notices Jihl start to shrink even faster.

"Oh, that's unfortunate." Dagger tells Jihl unapologetically.

Jihl growls and throws that shrinking crystal at Dagger in a last ditch effort to shrink the summoner, but Jihl's smaller size and weaker strength throw her off balance and the crystal doesn't go very far before landing on the crystalized ground harmlessly. Jihl gasps in shock at how weak she's accidentally made herself, and then gasps again as she suddenly recedes into her clothing, her glasses falling down at last with a crack.

Dagger watched the pitiful scene carefully, she was a little worried about the shrinking crystal hitting her, but that fear quickly faded along with Jihl. Her shrunken foe had disappeared into her clothing. Dagger went over to the seemingly empty clothes to investigate.

While Dagger checked out the clothes, Jihl had made her escape. She hadn't expected to get shrunk into her own clothing, but she was able to quickly adapt to the change and plan accordingly. She knew Dagger would take a look for her in her clothes, so as soon as she was sure she was out of the black haired girl's sight, Jihl made it her priority to escape her clothes as soon as possible.

The plan worked well enough, Jihl thought, as she watched the oblivious giantess that was her enemy rummage through her discarded clothing. But now, she was stuck small and without clothes or weaponry, her situation seemed hopeless.
It was made even more hopeless by the fact that Jihl's shrinking had ended and left the poor woman only a mere quarter of an inch tall, although this fact was not known to the woman herself; she merely assumed that her shrinking had ended at a normal rate, not the double rate caused by her grabbing a shrinking crystal.

Still, Jihl was glad that she made it away from Dagger at least. She plotted about how to get her revenge on the summoner girl when she realized something...
