1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.content:
The image on the screen showed the screw attack symbol Samus knew well. Samus smiled upon seeing the familiar thunder bolt insignia on the screen, she knew it meant an upgrade for her suit was ready and waiting for her. Samus wasted no time in touching the button on the screen to prepare the download. Not once thinking it suspicious, she got upgrades all the time after all.

Loud, mechanical sounds came from the cockpit of her ship as the upgrade module came down from the roof. Samus looked over at it briefly before turning her attention back to the computer screen.

"Hmm." She said flatly. "It'll take another minute or two at the rate it's downloading."

Samus looked over at the upgrade module again, eagerly awaiting the upgrade to finish downloading. Once it was done, she decided, she'd go over there and put her arm cannon in it, downloading the upgrade in the usual way. But for now, she had to be content with watching the computer screen, and the download bar for the upgrade slowly make its way across it.

Meanwhile, inside Samus's suit, the shrunken group were still climbing onwards. They made it to Samus's shoulder just as she finished with the computer. The group took a short rest as they waited for the last person, Zelda, to make it up there.

"Did you hear that?" Lucina asked. "She said something about a 'download' but what is that?"

"It must be an upgrade for her suit!" Peach exclaimed. Remembering how Samus explained it to her once before. "Oh, but the download is how she gets it. It'll take some time for it to finish though."

"How long will it take?" Robin asked.

"It sounds like only a couple of minutes." Peach said.

"Then we have to hurry!" Lucina exclaimed. She ran over to the edge of Samus's shoulder and saw Zelda almost at the top, she reached down and helped the brunette princess up.

"Thank you, Lucina." Zelda said as she got settled on the giantess's shoulder. "I'm sorry for making you all wait."

"Don't worry about it." Robin said with a smile. "We're not going anywhere without all of us here."

"Yeah, now let's keep moving!" Lucina said.

Zelda nodded, and the group started to move to the front of Samus's neck, all of them except for Rosalina, who had thought of something.

"Hold on a second." Rosalina said.

"What is it? We've got to go fast!" Lucina asked.

"Look." Rosalina pointed to Samus's hair, it was wrapped up in a ponytail and hanging down, confined by the power suit as it was though, it was close enough for the shrunken group to reach.

"We can climb her hair." Rosalina explained.

"She's right! It'll be easier to climb too!" Peach said, hopeful.

"Well, yes, but we're trying to get Samus's attention by going to her eyes and making her notice us that way." Robin stated. "Climbing her hair will put us further from her eyes."

"I know. But if we climb her hair, then we can reach her ear. She'll surely hear us from there, don't you think?" Rosalina asked.

"That's a good point." Zelda said.

"Yeah, but we don't have time to sit around and decide! Samus is going to start moving again soon!" Lucina shouted. She turned to Robin to ask, "What should we do? How are we going to climb her?"

Robin thought it over quickly, his decision pretty much already made. The group would continue to make their way up Samus's body...

1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.content:
The group came so close to Samus's ear, they only had another inch to go before reaching it. Robin and the girls were kicking it into overdrive in an attempt to make it in time. Unfortunately, the whole group feels a sudden jolt of Samus's body, knocking them around and making them have to hold tight, not being able to move.

"We're so close!" Lucina shouts.

"Let's try shouting anyway! Let's warn her!" Robin commands.

The girls agree and everyone starts to shout at Samus as loudly as they could, desperately trying to warn her of Master Hand's evil plan. Although they didn't know for sure, the group had suspected that the so-called "upgrade" for Samus's suit was nothing more than another trick by the evil hand.

Meanwhile, Samus had just thrust her arm cannon into the upgrade module and started the process of getting the new upgrade at last. As it was installing, she couldn't help but think that there was some kind of bug buzzing around ear. She quickly shrugged it off though, with her power suit on there was no way a pest like that could ever get inside to make such noises.

In a moment and with a familiar jingle, Samus's new upgrade was received! Samus smiled to herself and began checking her suit's systems to see what exactly it was. When all of a sudden, her suit powered down! Samus was shocked for but a moment before she reacted quickly and tried the emergency eject button, but it didn't work, she was stuck in her now useless power suit!

Keeping her wits about her, and a cool head, Samus tried the next best thing, removing the suit herself. But she found that her suit had locked up completely, she couldn't move at all! Then, as she was trying to figure out how to get out of her own suit, she felt a tingling sensation come across her entire body. She felt weak, and would've fallen down, had her immovable suit not prevented such a thing. Next she felt the suit start to get bigger. She gasped as she watched herself sort of fall into her own suit, even her zero suit was creeping up on her!

Samus knew then what was happening to her, she was shrinking!

Samus knew it was happening, but was powerless to prevent it, or do anything really, now that she felt so weak, all she could do was watch helplessly as both her power suit and her zero suit expanded around her shrinking form. She then heard something in her ear, like before, but this time it was much clearer.

"Samus!" She thought she heard a feminine voice call her name.

With some effort, the shrinking bounty hunter looked around her suit, but saw no one. Then, she felt something tug on her hair. Instinctively she whacked the tiny nuisance, realizing now that her strength was returning. She heard another small squeak upon doing so though, and thought to check what it was. When she opened her hand, she was shocked. It was none other than her good friend, Princess Zelda! Only, she was just inches tall, to Samus at least.

"Zelda?!" Samus exclaimed.

"S-Samus, be careful..!" Zelda shouted. "You nearly crushed me!"

"I-I'm sorry..." Samus said quietly. It was so strange for her to be holding Zelda like this. She then thought that if Zelda was this small, then maybe she knew what was going on with her own shrinking. "How did you get so small?" She asked.

Zelda took a moment to collect herself before answering. "Master Hand is working with Tabuu, and they're shrinking smashers from every world!" Zelda explained. "We tried to warn you, but it was too late! You were too big to climb, and we were so small..."

"We? There are others with you?" Samus asked, piecing together the situation.

"Yes! They're on your hair!" Zelda shouted.

By this point, Zelda was the size of a large doll to Samus, and getting bigger to the shrinking woman. She could now feel the other people weighing on her hair. It hurt, so she brought her hand to just below where she felt them at and told them to jump. The shrunken people did. Samus looked at the shrunken people, and saw that princess Peach was one of them as well.

"Crap, they got so many of you..!" Samus said.

"Samus, you need to be careful, you're still shrinking!" Robin shouted. He wanted to warn her now, and save the introductions for later.

"How small will I get?" Samus asked.

"I don't know, hopefully you'll stop at our size, or better yet, even bigger!" Robin replied.

Next..

"Just in case, I better you put you down Zelda," Samus said to the hyrule princess, Zelda agrees with a nod as the bounty hunters tries her best to put tinier woman near the other.

"Sammy! You're getting smaller then us!" Peach shouts as Samus gets smaller the group. Samus is surprises as she watches the once tiny group now starting to look bigger to her. Samus knew she had to keep calm.

"At least leave me some height," Samus thought and.....
1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.title: Samus shrinks even smaller then the group!

1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.content:
Samus shrank smaller and smaller, far below the heights of the other shrunken people. She kept calm throughout the process, not an easy thing for her to do, knowing how small these people must've been made it all the more scarier to think that she was getting even smaller than them!

After a minute or so more of Samus shrinking, the tinier bounty hunter finally stopped. Samus was happy that her shrinking ended, but with all these tiny giants looming over her, it really hit home how small she now was. Indeed, Samus was barely a little doll compared to these millimeter tall titans, looking no more than 6 inches tall by their perspectives!

Damn! I can't believe this has happened! Samus thought, keeping her anger to herself for now. To get so small... at least Zelda and Peach are here to help me... I hope I can trust these newcomers too.

It was then that Zelda picked up the tinier woman. She was amazed that anyone could get this small, although Zelda herself had been extremely small before, Samus was now even tinier than her during that harrowing experience. It had only been just minutes before that their roles had been reversed.

Samus let out an involuntary yelp as she was grabbed by Zelda, and when she was brought up in front of the princess's intent gaze, she grimaced. She felt like a helpless little doll in Zelda's grip. For the formerly quite powerful bounty hunter, being as small as she was now was awful. Despite herself, Samus found herself blushing as the taller woman continued to examine her.

"Zelda, please." Samus said, her words sounding almost pleading. "Put me down, I can walk on my own."

"Yes, I'm sorry." Zelda said and complied with the smaller woman's wishes. "It's just that, I've been almost so small myself during this journey, it's incredible to think that anyone could get so small."

"Yeah, well, as 'incredible' as you think it is, this is horrible for me!" Samus shot back, getting upset with her predicament. She was, after all, a bounty hunter, and as such not used to being held like a doll. She recalled the times her arch-enemy Ridley had held her in his deathly vice-grip, to see him or any other of her foes now, the thought actually scared her and made her shiver. Robin noticed her reaction.

"I'm sorry. I didn't mean to be rude..." Zelda apologized. Samus eased up a little at that, but was still mad that she shrunk so much.

"It's okay, Samus. We understand." Robin told the tinier bounty hunter.

"Thanks, you two.." Samus said softly.

"So what now? Do we just leave?" Lucina asked. "Master Hand already got what he wanted here, after all..."

"That's true. But remember, we've been shrinking each time we go through the world portals. If we go through it again, who knows how small we might end up?" Rosalina said. She looked down at the smallest woman, and asked her, "Samus, do you have anything on this ship that might help us grow, even a little bit?"

"Ooh, good thinking Rosie!" Peach exclaimed. "Sammy, can you help us?"

Samus then answered...

"That's good. I'm amazed how far your technology is," Zelda adds as well.

"But it's still a prototype," Rosalina said with a skeptic look on her face. "Do you believe it would even work?"

"It's true that it's a prototype," Robin said not really understanding what a ray is. "But it's our best possibility to gain some height for Samus and us,"

Samus is surprise that the young man put her first when agreeing with the plan, the bounty hunter is happy that Peach and Zelda were able to find a trustworthy person.

"I agree," Lucina agreeing with her boyfriend. "It's not like we have any other plan,"

"Yes your right. Let's get out of Samus's suit and try to find that ray," Rosalina agreeing with the plan to find the ray. "We can use that hole we entered before,"

"Yeah.... But how are we going to find it?" Peach asks the group. "Sammy's zero suit covering it up,"

The gorup look down and see they are standing on Samus's Zero suit, they must be near the crotch area of the power suit while the zero suit spread to both legs.

"We just need to look for the exit then," Samus said and asks. "Where is the hole in my suite?" It must have been a small hole if the bounty hunter didn't even notice it.

"Near you feet," Zelda explains to the smaller woman, Samus is surprise to hear Zelda explanation and sighs in relief.

1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.content:
Suddenly and without warning, Samus's power suit started to shake!

"What's happening!?" Peach cried.

"Oh no, it couldn't be..?" Samus whispered.

"Samus, what's wrong? What's happening?" Zelda asked, noticing her smaller friend's reaction. Samus looked up at her with just a hint of worry in her expression.

"We have to be careful, everyone!" Samus shouted. "My power suit is changing forms!"

"What!? Changing forms?" Lucina shouted.

Before Samus could explain further, the suit started to shrink, collapsing into itself as it got smaller and took on a more rounded shape. Within seconds, the power suit had changed into it's morph ball form. A round, spherical shape that Samus used to get into small holes.

Inside the ball, the shrunken group we're now trapped! Samus's zero suit hadn't shrunk with the rest of it, so it pressed up all around them. It took several minutes for the tiny people to get out of the mess and find each other again. When they did, they saw that the space they were in was now like a large, round room. It was dark, and hard to move over the zero suit.

"What just happened!?" Lucina asked.

A tiny cough came from Samus, who had ended up next to Zelda again, the brunette princess held the tinier bounty hunter, who then spoke, "My suit is in it's morph ball form now." She explained.

"This is what it's like in your suit when it's in morph ball mode?" Peach asked. "That's cool! But, how do you possibly fit inside it at your normal size?"

"It's... complicated." Samus answered.

"How do we get out of here?" Robin asked, wanting to get everyone to safety as soon as possible.

Just then, a screen appeared, flickering to life just above the shrunken group. It showed an image of what appeared to be a high-tech, futuristic room, Samus's ship they realized.

"What is that?" Robin asked.

"This is how I see inside my Morph Ball form." Samus explained.

"Wow. So that's how it's done..." Peach said.

"That's interesting." Rosalina added.

"So what do we do now?" Lucina asked.
1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.title: Trapped in Samus's suit!

1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.content:
Seeing the screen appear made Samus think, if the screen was working, then maybe her suit had power in it yet! She figured that it must've turned on an energy-saving protocol, turning into the Morph Ball to use what little power it had left in it effectively. Samus was glad that she had remembered to install such a feature, although it did little to help her now, she never could have planned for being shrunk! Still, if there was power left in the suit, she thought that it might be possible to control the ball.

"I just thought of something everyone." Samus said with sudden confidence.

"What is it?" Zelda asked.

"I think there's still power in my suit, if it changed to Morph Ball form in the first place, there must be!" Samus explained. "So what I'm thinking is that we may be able to control it, even at our sizes, well, maybe not mine, but you guys should still be able to work it through the wiring."

"Wiring? What's that?" Lucina asked.

"Oh, you must be from a world without electricity then?" Samus asked.

"Yes, they are. Much like me." Zelda said. "We can introduce you later. For now, just explain the plan."

"Right. So if you guys can find the right wires and manipulate them properly, then you should be able to move the ball around! Possibly even open the suit!" Samus explained eagerly.

"Really!? That sounds great!" Peach exclaimed.

"Yeah, if this works, then we could even get to the prototype size ray this way!" Lucina agreed.

"Yes, but how will we know what to do?" Rosalina asked.

"I'll explain it to you." Samus said.

"Okay then, one of us will stay here, while the others go and find those wires!" Robin said. He was pleasantly surprised at how well Samus handled the situation, especially with her current size. He found it admirable.

"So who stays?" Lucina asked.

1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.content:
The group once again made a trek through the jungle-like wires and narrow corridors of the morph ball. On the way, Robin and Samus spoke of various things, eventually leading to the tinier bounty hunter being introduced to the rest of the newcomers. Samus smiled and greeted them all warmly, her level-headedness returned despite her smaller size. And the group was, of course, happy to be finally formally introduced to her as well. Since they'd been together for so long already, it was really not too big of a deal.

After that, the group continued their journey through the morph ball, for several more minutes until they finally made it to the bomb hatch.

"This is it." Samus told the group.

"Good, let's open it up!" Robin said.

"It's easy to do, just press that button there." Samus explained, pointing to a small red button next to the hatch, and thankfully, at their tiny level.

Lucina was the one to go over and press it, and then the hatch opened, creating a small hole that was just big enough for a person their size to go through.

"Finally! We're out of your suit, Sammy!" Peach said, exhausted from all they had done in Samus's power suit.

"Yes, now we just need to get to the size ray." Rosalina said.

"Okay, then, you guys go on out then." Robin said, motioning to the now open hatch. The girls nodded and agreed, leaving one by one. Once everyone else was out, Robin, and Samus, got out as well.

Now back in Samus's ship proper, the space was a lot less claustrophobic, reminding everyone of how small they really were. Especially Samus, since she hadn't seen the outside of her suit since she shrank, it was an odd experience for the tinier woman, but she kept her cool and stayed calm.

"I can't believe this is my ship..." Samus said softly, taking in the size of everything.

"Don't worry, Samus. We'll get to that size ray and fix everything soon." Robin assured her.

"I know. It's just a strange feeling, that's all." Samus said.

"I know what you mean." Robin said. "But look, there's the ray, right?"

Samus looked ahead and saw that the size ray was indeed just a few feet away from them. She was happy to see it, and although she hadn't used it before, she was sure it would bring her and the rest of the group back to normal.

"Let's go!" Lucina said.

"Yeah, to the size ray!" Peach exclaimed.

Lucina and Peach ran off towards the size ray.

"Haha, they're certainly excited." Rosalina laughed.

"Can you blame them? I don't want to be this small any longer myself." Zelda said with a smile.

"Looks like everyone's going." Robin said.

"Yeah, let's go ourselves." Samus said.

And then, Robin and the rest of the shrunken group started walking to the ray as well.

"Hey, you do know how to work this thing, right?" Robin asked Samus on the way. The question suddenly striking him.

"Samus, it worked!" Robin exclaimed in his joy. But when he looked down at the woman in his hand, he realized that he might have jumped the gun in his excitement. "What is this, Palutena?" Robin asked. Starting to get a little frustrated at being lead the wrong way again.

"Uhm..." Palutena squeaked. She didn't know what to say. Was telling them the truth the way to go? She felt bad enough that she'd lead her new friends on a wild goose chase as it is.

For now though, Robin and Wii Fit Trainer walked into the kitchen anyway. The expansive kitchen of the goddess didn't look much different than any other regular kitchen, other than being magnified to increased size by the tiny group's minuscule scales.

"Anyone hungry?" Samus asked.

"Now that you mention it, I am a little hungry." Lucina said.

"So am I." Rosalina added. "It's strange that we haven't had to eat much this whole time. Not even really feeling hungry until now."

"Yeah. Even on my ship you guys didn't seem to be very hungry." Samus said.

"Maybe that's because of the shrinking?" Zelda wondered.

"Whatever the reason, I really could go for something to eat!" Lucina said.

"Yeah. It might not have been the way we wanted to go, but Palutena's lead us to a good place to snack." Robin said, having heard the tinier girls' conversation.

"Palutena hasn't been telling us the truth." Wii Fit Trainer said bluntly.

"What!?" Everyone was shocked to hear Wii Fit Trainer's accusation.

"What do you mean, Fit?" Robin asked.

"The goddess hasn't been truthful." Wii Fit Trianer repeated.

"Palutena? Is what Fit says true?" Robin asked the tiny, 10 millimeter tall goddess.

Palutena shook her head and sighed...
1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.title: Wrong way... or is it?

1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.content:
"Well..." Palutena started nervously. "The truth is... I can't remember!"

"You can't remember?" Robin asked.

Palutena nodded. "Yeah... When I woke up this morning, I don't know, something felt strange. And then I realized when trying to give directions to my room, I can't remember how to get there!"

"Another trick by Master Hand?" Zelda asked.

"Seems likely." Rosalina said. "He must've gotten to her in the night after all.."

"I'm sorry for lying everyone! I just felt like I had to, because if I didn't you'd all think I was stupid or something..." Palutena cried.

"Oh, no, Palutena! We'd never think that!" Rosalina consoled the comparative giantess goddess.

"Yeah. Have some faith in your teammates!" Lucina said.

"They're right." Robin said, feeling sorry for the tinier goddess. "We'd not have thought less of you, Palutena."

"You should have told us sooner." Wii Fit Trainer said.

"Fit!" Peach shouted.

"No, she's right." Palutena said. She felt better after telling everyone the truth, and hearing them forgive her. "I should have. I'm really sorry for leading everyone here."

"No! It's okay! We've gotten hungry anyway, right?" Lucina asked her shrunken comrades, who all agreed. "See?" Lucina asked.

"Really? You're sure you want to stop and eat? Maybe we should just try and find my room again?" Palutena asked.

"Robin, what do you want to do?" Wii Fit Trainer asked the group's leader.

Robin thought about it for a while before deciding...
1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.title: Palutena comes clean

that every cabinet door is closed tight.

"But is there any way to get any food while we are this size?" Rosalina asks as the cosmic does feel hungry but at their sizes it would be quite difficult for them to get a piece of food.

"There should be some bread, fruits and water in one of the bottom cabinets" Palutena speaks up wanting to redeem herself to the others.

"That should be easy to get to but how are we going to get in?" Samus asks, the bounty hunter figures that the smaller members could possible get in into the cabinet thought the small space.

"Maybe we can be lucky and the door to the cabinet is slightly open," Zelda said, hoping that what she said is true.

"Yes, that would be great," Lucina adds and hopes what Zelda said is correct.

"Let's have a look around then," Robin said and as the others agreed.

"Yes let's get going," Wii Fit Trainer adds as Robin and herself start to walk in the gigantic kitchen.

It takes about twenty minutes of the two tiny humans to check all the bottom cabinets and the two find.....

The group's search to find an open cabinet door ended in failure, as all the delicious food Palutena told them about was locked behind the huge, closed door's of the cabinets. At the group's sizes, there wasn't any way to really open them. Even Robin, the largest member of the group, couldn't pull it off.

"Dang. All the doors are shut!" Robin stated his disappointment.

"No!" Peach cried.

"That's okay!" Palutena tried to cheer up her friend. "There's probably some other food laying around we can eat!"

Robin shook his head. Him and Wii Fit Trainer had crossed practically the whole kitchen and not seen any sign of food in a place they could reach. The place was so neat and clean that there weren't even any scraps left behind, not that they'd want to eat those.

"Sorry, girls. But Fit and I didn't see anything to eat anywhere in the kitchen while we were walking around it." Robin said.

"It's true." Wii Fit Trainer added. "No food."

Palutena gasped, while the other girls just groaned. Everyone was starting to feel their hunger rise, they needed some snacks and fast!

"If only my powers still worked!" Palutena shouted, upset. "If only we weren't so small!"

"It's alright, Palutena. We'll find a way." Robin said. But he wasn't really sure of it himself. Unless there was something he missed on the way over here, there didn't seem to be any chance of getting into the food cabinets.

1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.content:
It was none other the hero of Skyland himself, Pit. The brown haired young angel walked into the kitchen dressed in his usual outfit, looking quite famished. He didn't notice the tiny woman watching him on the floor.

"It's Pit." Wii Fit Trainer said in monotone. She knew the angel well, since she had trained him on occasion along with Palutena, so she trusted him to help.

But first, she thought she'd tell the others. So she headed back and told them the good news.

"Pit's here!? He'll help us for sure! We have to get him to notice us!" Palutena insisted.

"I agree. But it might hard to do at our sizes." Robin said. Being only an inch tall made things difficult.

"Yes." Wii Fit Trainer said. She wondered if she might have a chance to be seen clearly by Pit at all, being only half of Robin's height.

"Please! You have try!" Palutena begged.

"Don't worry, we're going to." Robin told her with a smile. "But I think for your safety only Fit and I should go."

"I think that's wise." Zelda said.

"But you're not going to leave us here all alone are you?" Lucina asked.

"It'll be okay if we hide you, right?" Robin said. "Here."

Robin then hid the tinier girls in a small, nearby nook that housed them all comfortably, and hid them from Pit.

"Are you okay in there?" Robin asked.

"Yes, but..." Lucina started to say, worried about being left alone, and about Robin's safety.

"We're all good!" Peach exclaimed, bubbly as ever.

"Great." Robin said. Then stood up and faced Wii Fit Trainer. "Let's get goin-"

"Wait!" Palutena shouted.

"Hm? What is it?" Robin asked.

"Take me with you!" Palutena cried. "I need Pit to see me!"

The incredibly tiny goddess looked very distressed. Robin couldn't help but feel for her.

"...Okay. If it's only you it should be fine." Robin said. He reached down and picked up the 10 millimeter tall goddess. "Ready?" Palutena nodded. Robin looked at Wii Fit Trainer, and she nodded as well. "Let's go."

Robin and Wii Fit Trainer walked over to where Pit was. The angel was busy making himself a sandwhich. Robin thought it would be a great opportunity to get his attention. So he and Wii Fit Trainer ran up to the giant angel and shouted up at him, but Pit didn't seem to notice. Robin and Fit tried a different tactic, hitting him on his sandal-clad feet. But before Robin or Wii Fit Trainer could make it over to Pit's feet, he moved away from them.

"Oh, man. Working on guard duty for Lady Palutena is tough. Really builds up an appetite!" Pit said as he continued making a sandwhich for himself. But then he stops and looks confused. "But I wonder where Lady Palutena is now?"

"I'm down here, Pit!" Palutena shouted. But it's no use as the near-microscopic goddess's voice is far too quiet to be heard from where she was.

"It's no use, Palutena." Robin said. "We have to get his attention some other way."

Palutena sighed, knowing Robin was right. She just wished Pit would notice her somehow.

As the three were trying to figure out another way to get Pit's attention, the giant angel dropped some mayo on the floor. The condiment landed right next to where Robin and Wii Fit Trainer were, and had splashed on them! Robin, Wii Fit Trainer and Palutena were all stuck in the white stuff!

"Dang it, Pit!" Robin shouted. The careless angel was getting on his nerves. But it could be worse, he thought, at least him and the girls were still safe. Although Palutena was completely covered in mayo now, Robin still had his hand on her, he held the tiny goddess above the rest of the mess.

"Pit... How could you!?" Palutena cried, humiliated by the ordeal. She tried to wipe the mayo off of her body, to little success.

Robin and Wii Fit Trainer struggled to get out, but before they could Pit had other things in mind.

"Whoops." Pit said. "Better clean that up before Lady Palutena sees it!"

Pit grabbed a napkin and swooped it down in his hand down to wipe up the mayo when...

"Oh no, not again!" Robin groans. He checks on the smaller woman still holding onto his finger, she seems to be okay. "Are you alright, Palutena?"

"I'm fine. But Pit!" Palutena shouts.

"Pit is getting away." Wii Fit Trainer says.

Robin looks up and sees that Pit has left the tiny people behind, and with them stuck in the mayo again there isn't any way for them to chase after the giant angel.

There's another knock at the door before Pit makes it over and opens the door, and sees Toon Link standing in the doorway.

"Hey, Toon Link!" Pit greets his friend with a smile.

"Hey." Toon Link replies, with a smile as well, but he seems a little worried too. "Is Palutena here?"

"Yeah, come in." Pit steps aside.

Toon Link enters the kitchen. "That's good." He says. "Where is she now?"

"I don't know. I haven't seen today yet." Pit answers. He steps back over the counter where his food was, narrowly missing the spot of mayo three shrunken people were stuck in. Pit quickly starts putting the final touches on his sandwhich.

"I was just making some food for the both of us." Pit says.

"Uh-oh." Toon Link says. "If you haven't seen her today, then there's a chance..."

"What's wrong?" Pit asks. Putting the food down for a moment.

"Something been happening lately, Smashers have gone missing in some of the worlds." Toon Link explains. "We're not sure when it started, but Zelda hasn't been seen in Hyrule for some time now."

"That's terrible! Do you know what's happening?" Pit asks.

Toon Link shakes his head. "I don't know. But so far, Princess Peach, Rosalina, Princess Zelda, Samus Aran, Wii Fit Trainer, Lucina and Robin have all gone missing!"

"Oh no, and you think Lady Palutena might be next?" Pit asks.

"Yeah. Aside from Robin, all the other missing Smashers are female, so they sent me here to warn Palutena. We think Master Hand might be behind it." Toon Link explains.

"W-We have to go check on her!" Pit exclaims.

Toon Link nods.

Meanwhile, three of the missing Smashers Toon Link listed were still struggling to get out of the mayo mess they had fallen into again. Robin got out first, and helped Wii Fit Trainer get out next. But already they could see Pit and Toon Link getting ready to leave the kitchen.

"Come on, we have to catch up with them!" Robin shouts.

"There's no time! We'll never make it!" Palutena cries

Thankfully, the tinier girls were all still right where Robin had left them, and looking none worse the wear.

"You're all okay!" Robin says as he approaches them.

"Robin!" Lucina shouts, and she runs into her boyfriend's arms. "We saw everything! We were so worried you might've gotten crushed!"

"Oh, Lucina. No, we're all okay!" Robin says. "I was more worried about you all. I shouldn't have left you behind."

"No, you only did what you thought you had to." Rosalina says.

"You did the right thing." Zelda says. "Look, everything turned out alright." She points up to their new friends, Pit and Toon Link.

"Did you find them?" Pit asks, squinting his eyes to try and see the smaller members of the group.

"Yes, they're all okay!" Robin shouts. Pit nods and smiles, not sure what else to do, the others must be so small he can't even see them.

"Yeah, we're all okay. Now let's get these giants to help us find Palutena's room already!" Samus shouts.

Robin nods, then tells Pit what's happened to them so far, and how they were trying to find Palutena's room to get the drink of the gods. He leaves out the more "sensitive" parts of the story, and how Palutena suddenly couldn't remember how to navigate her own temple.

"So that's what's going on!" Pit says, after Robin finishes his explanation. "Okay. We'll help you then! Right, Toon Link?"

"Of course." Toon Link agrees. "But how are we going to carry them? The others are so small, they might get hurt."

"Yay! We get to ride on Robin again!" Peach exclaims in joy. Her enthusiasm makes the other girls giggle, and then they all allow themselves to be picked up by Robin.

1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.content:
Robin was the one they ended up choosing. The white haired young man reluctantly agreed. He hoped the smaller girls would want to grow first, but also didn't want to disappoint them, knowing they wanted to see him big. So he stepped up to the teaspoon and drank the magic liquid.

"Mmm, that's pretty good." Robin said, enjoying the taste of the drink of the gods.

He swallowed, then waited - along with the girls, who were eager to see their beloved Robin at normal size from their tinier perspectives- for the effects to kick in. A moment later, Robin felt himself start to grow, more and more, until finally...
1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.title: Robin

1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.content:
Robin's growth stopped abruptly. The tactician was confused by this, he was nowhere near his normal size yet! Indeed, Robin was only about half his normal height.

"Something's wrong. I should be bigger than this." Robin said.

"You look to be only half your normal height." Wii Fit Trainer said. Robin had a hard time hearing the half inch tall woman, so got down closer to the floor.

"You all look so small." Robin said. Wii Fit Trainer was extremely small compared to him already, and he could only just barely make out Palutena, the smaller girls he couldn't see at all. "But never mind that. Please try some of the drink now. It may not make you normal sized again, but I'll at least be able to see you."

"He's telling us to try the drink." Palutena told the tinier girls.

"So we heard." Samus said. "Why didn't he grow back to normal?"

"Who knows?" Peach said, smile on her face. "He's big now, so what's the difference!"

"I'm not sure." Palutena said, ignoring Peach's comments. "But I think he's right about one of us growing a bit."

"I agree. Who wants to try next?" Zelda asked.

"I'll do it." Lucina offered.

"Okay. Go ahead." Palutena said.

Lucina nodded to the goddess, and went up to the teaspoon. The massive utensil was a challenge for the speck-sized swordswoman to reach over, but she made it just barely. Lucina drank from it. In a moment, her body began to grow just like Robin's had before. Lucina was excited to be finally growing, but her excitement was stopped when her growth halted. She was now eye-to-eye with Robin.

"Oh, Robin!" Lucina cried, and hugged her boyfriend.

"I'm glad you're back to size." Robin said as he held her.

"Yes, thank you." Lucina said. Then looked down at her smaller friends. "But this 'drink of the gods' only seems to grow us back to a certain height."

"It looks that way." Robin said. "But there might be something we can do."

"What?"

Robin bent down. "Excuse me, ladies." He said, wanting the tiny women to move out of his way, they did, and he picked up the teaspoon. "We can try taking another drink of the stuff."

"Okay..." Lucina said. "I hope this works."

Robin nodded, and then took a small sip of the drink of the gods.
1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.title: Two half size heroes

choices: Everyone else gets to grow half thier hieght.
Everyone else ends up diffrent sizes.
1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.content:
After taking a sip, Robin and everyone wait to see if it takes affect on the tactician. After a few minutes it looks like Robin is not growing any more. Robin and Lucina both sigh as nothing changing.

"Looks like this is the tallest we're going to get," Lucina notes, but she is happy that they regain some height from this.

"Yeah," Robin replies and then says.

"Hey is everything alright in there?" A voice from behind the closed door asks.

"Everything is fine Pit," Robin answers the angel as Lucina looks at the tiny Wii Fit Trainer and other tinier woman.

"I think everyone should drink and grow some before anything else happens," The blue hair swords woman said to her tinier friends.

"Okay, then who should go next then?" Wii Fit Trainer asks the other tinier woman.

While the tinier woman talk about who goes next, Robin and Lucina get two togas from the bag Pit brought in. Robin didn't have trouble putting it on and looks to see that Lucina is blushing a bit. Robin could see why as the toga that the swords woman is wearing wraps nice around her figure and you can see her body shape.

"I wish these togas were a bit bigger," Lucina said as she thought toga would cover them well but it seems like Palutena's army is near their current size.

"I think you look quite lovely," Robin comments and Lucain smiles on the comment.

"You're not bad you're self," Lucina replies and gives the young man a kiss on the cheek.

Peach is watching Robin and Lucina's interaction and thought it was quite cute, Plus the mushroom kingdom princess couldn't wait to how snug the togas will be on the others and start to feel warm. Peach then looks at the others equal tiny woman and see that Rosalina is the next up for the drink, and couldn't wait to see her friend grow. else
1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.title: The drink only grows them half to heights

choices: They meet up with Pit and Toon Link
Something happens before they can go
1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.content:
Rosalina takes a sip of the drink of the gods and quickly shoots up in size. The galaxy princess is happy to finally be growing again, but her joy is shot when she comes up a little short. Literally, as Rosalina is now only half the size of the already half sized Robin and Lucina, a very short foot and a half tall!

"What happened?" Rosalina asked.

"You didn't grow to three feet?" Lucina said.

"No. It seems not." Rosalina replied, looking up at her larger friend.

"Oh no." Robin said, getting a bad feeling. "Could this be like the 'growth' potion we took at Zelda's world?"

Lucina gasped. "You might be right, Robin!" She said. "It might be losing it's potency after every drink."

"Yes. I hope that's not the case though." Robin said.

"If it is, let's let Samus go next. She's the smallest one here after all." Rosalina said.

"Good thinking." Robin said. He got down on the floor, next to Palutena and the smaller girls. "Samus, or Palutena, whoever can hear us! Did you get all that?" He asked them in a whisper. He couldn't quite hear their response, but he thought he saw Palutena nod her head in the affirmative.

A moment later, Samus stepped up to the teaspoon for her turn to drink. The tiniest woman took her sip of the drink of the gods. Then she started to grow, bigger and bigger until Robin and the other two who had grown could at least see her once more. But then, Samus's growth stopped suddenly. The tiny, blonde bounty hunter was left just an inch tall. Still bug sized by normal standards.

"Oh god. It looks like you were right!" Samus squeaked.

"This isn't good. The drink can't lose potency this fast!" Robin said.

"Someone else needs to try the drink, now!" Lucina said.

Samus nodded in agreement. She turned to her smaller friends, they were still easily visible to her eyes.

"Everyone, you need to try the drink!" Samus insisted.

Palutena and the other girls understood. They had seen the effects of the drink seemed to be diminishing at a very fast rate. But they'd still take turns to see who should grow. Feeling it was her fault for getting everyone so small in the first place, Palutena volunteered to go last. And Peach wanted to stay small for as long as she could, so next up was Zelda.

The Hyrulean princess took her sip of the drink of the gods, and started to grow like the others before her. But this time, to everyone's surprise, Zelda surpassed Samus's height! Zelda grew to be 12 inches tall.

"I don't understand. How did this happen?" Zelda asked when her growth had finished.

"Yeah! How come she's bigger than me?" Samus also wanted to know.

"It's strange. But I don't know." Robin said.

"Maybe the size we grow to is random?" Lucina offered her explanation.

"You might be on to something." Rosalina said. "Can someone else please try now?"

While the group tried to figure out what was going on with the drink of the gods. Wii Fit Trainer took her turn with the fabled drink. A few seconds later, a 2 feet tall Wii Fit Trainer was standing with the rest of the group.

"Hmm." Was all Wii Fit Trainer said when her growth stopped. She looked down at Samus, then up to Robin and Lucina. "In the middle." She then said. No one knew what she meant by that.

"It seems the size you grow to is random." Rosalina noted.

"Looks like Robin and Lucina got lucky." Zelda said.

"Yeah, looks that way. I'm grateful." Lucina said with a slight smile.

"Well, let's get the other girls up to size next." Robin said. He didn't understand why the drink wasn't growing them to a set size, but their constant size changing adventures made him not question it too much. He now just hoped that Peach and Palutena would get up to large enough sizes.

Meanwhile, Zelda, Rosalina and Wii Fit Trainer put on their togas, after noticing how long they'd been standing around in the nude. Not that they would care much now, but Pit and Toon Link were on the other side of the door. When they were all done dressing up, they noticed that the togas that looked very tight on Robin and Lucina were very baggy on Rosalina, Zelda and Wii Fit Trainer. It looked more like they were wearing tents rather than clothes.

"This won't do." Rosalina said, as she tried to adjust her toga to fit better.

"Yes, I agree." Zelda said, also trying to adjust her clothes, but giving up shortly.

While Rosalina and Zelda were not happy with their ill-fitting clothes, Wii Fit Trainer quite enjoyed them.

"It's easy to move around in!" Wii Fit Trainer said.

"I'm glad you like it." Zelda said. "And at least we can wear these togas. Samus here is too small for them!"

"Yeah. I know!" Samus squeaked.

"But we're not!" Palutena said.

The goddess of light had taken some of the drink of the gods by now and was now standing just a few inches under Robin's and Lucina's heights. She was standing naked next to princess Peach, who had just finished growing moments ago. The mushroom kingdom princess wasn't so lucky, she only grew to 6 inches tall. But she didn't mind at all.

"Yay! I'm still so small!" Peach cheered.

"Yeah, yeah. Put some clothes on!" Lucina shouted, tossing a toga at the tiny princess, who was far too small to wear it, and one to Palutena as well. Peach crawled out of the toga and stood up to Lucina.

"What's the matter, Lucina? You're not afraid little old me will take Robin from you, are you?" Peach teased the giantess.

"Sh-Shut up!" Lucina said, blushing.

"Hey, now. Enough of that. Let's get along so we can get back to normal, okay?" Palutena said, putting on her toga, which was very form-fitting on the half-sized goddess of light, accentuating her wonderful curves.

"Okay." Peach said. "Sorry, Lucina. I was just joking."

"I know." Lucina said.

"Hmph. Look at us now." Zelda said.

Everyone was now all different sizes, but Samus had it the worst. The galaxy's number one bounty hunter only grew to an inch tall, making her still the smallest member of the group. The tiniest woman tried to drink more of the drink of the gods, but it had no effect on her, now that she'd already taken it once. Samus threw her arms up in anger.

"Not again!" Samus shouted in frustration at still being the smallest. "Is it too much for me to grow a little bit more!?"

"That's okay, Sammy!" Peach said, bending down in front of the tinier blonde. "I think you look very cute at that size!"

"Hmph. Well, whatever. At least it beats being microscopic." Samus sighed.

"Alright, girls. Let's get going. Pit and Toon Link are probably wondering what's taking us so long!" Robin said.

The girls agreed and they got ready to leave Palutena's bedroom.
1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.title: Everyone else ends up diffrent sizes

choices: split up to cover more ground.
1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.content:
Robin and Lucina are able to open the doors and the shrunken group sees that Pit and Toon Link are waiting for them. Pit and Toon Link are both shock to see that the is group still in a shrunken state.

"Oh no! The Drink of the Gods didn't work," Pit said as Toon Link and himself get closer.

"Yes. But at least we have some height back," Palutena said trying to make the angle feel better. "But right now we need to find that giant hand,"

"Yes. We need to defeat the source of this problem," Lucina agreeing with green hair goddess. "But where could he be?"

"We could split up and have a look around the temple," Samus Squeaks hoping the others could hear her.

"Sammy is suggesting that we split up to cover more ground," Peach said as she holds the tiniest member of the group. Luckily Peach is being held by Robin the tactician hears the mushroom kingdom princess.

"That sounds good, we could have Palutena and Pit each take a group and search the temple," Robin said liking the idea of covering more ground.

"But is that a good idea?" Toon Link asks, the boy feeling they should stay together since many of their group is quite weaken and have no way to defend themselves.

"I understand how you fell Toon Link but this could possible be our best chance," Zelda answers knowing the boy is just worried about his friends.

"I think we should vote on how we should continue," Rosalina said feeling they should together but knew they could cover more ground if they split up.

"I agree," Wii Fit Trainer adds, the trainer believes that this will be the fastest way to solve the problem.

The group quickly takes a vote and the group.....
1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.title: Meeting up with Pit and Toon Link and a vote.

choices: One of the teams runs into Master Hand
No one finds him, so they meet back up
1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.content:
The vote was decided that the group split into teams.

"So it's decided then." Robin said.

"Yeah. I'll go along with it." Toon Link said.

"Okay, Pit. Can you handle being on your own?" Palutena asked her young angel warrior.

"Um, I think we should team up, Lady Palutena!" Pit insisted. But Palutena shook her head.

"As much as I would like to go with you, I have to lead the other team around the temple." The goddess of light told him with a smile. With her memory restored, guiding her new friends would be easy.

"I know..." Pit said, a little sad. "Who will you take with you?"

"Ooh! Me! Me!" Peach squeaked, holding her hand up. Palutena giggled.

"Of course I'll take you, Peach!" Palutena said. "And Samus, would you come with me?"

"If you need me, yes." Samus said. Peach and her went over to Palutena's side.

"Are you sure don't want someone, well, bigger?" Robin asked the goddess.

"No. These two will suit me fine." Palutena replied.

"Without our weapons, we're not going to be able to do much." Lucina said.

"It's okay." Robin said. "Handling them at our sizes wouldn't be very effective anyway."

"Um, well... there's a weapon storage room not too far from here. Would you like to go there?" Pit asked.

"Yes. That would be great!" Lucina said.

"Okay. Thanks, Pit." Robin said. "We'll go with you then."

Robin and Lucina joined Pit's side. Now Palutena and Pit were almost ready to take their groups and go into the temple to find Master Hand, they just needed to make the final choices of who would go with them. But before they could, Toon Link had something in mind.

"Before we go, I think I should lead a team as well." He said. "I'm normal sized after all."

"But how will you navigate the temple?" Pit asked.

"This." Toon Link pulled out a map from behind. "This will help me get around the temple."

"When did you get that?" Pit asked.

"Never mind that, Pit." Palutena said. "I think it's a great idea." She turned to the three who had yet to team up, Wii Fit Trainer, Zelda and Rosalina. "Would you three go with him?" She asked.

"Of course, Toon Link is quite the warrior," Zelda answers for herself.

"I don't mind." Wii Fit Trainer said.

"Neither do I." Rosalina added. Her, Wii Fit Trainer and Zelda went over to Toon Link's side.

"Thank you, Palutena. I'll keep them safe." Toon Link said.

"One more thing before we go." Robin said. "We don't know where Master Hand will be, or if he's even still in the temple. So what I want to suggest is that we all meet up back here in half an hour. Okay?"

"Good thinking. I agree." Palutena said.

"Sounds good." Pit said.

"Okay." Toon Link said.

"Good. Let's move out." Robin said.

And then the three teams set out into the temple to find Master Hand and stop him once and for all, when....
1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.title: The goddess, the angel, and the toon

"We found him," Peach said as the green hair goddess holds the tinier mushroom kingdom princess. Peach is also holding onto the tiniest member of the group, Samus.

Palutena nods in agreement as she peeks her head around the corner once more and sees the giant glove. The goddess remembers seeing the giant hand in her crystal ball and from the stories that Pit told her when he return from the last bout with the giant hand. The green hair woman is glad they were able to find the giant glove but is a bit sadden since her power is not fully back so she tear that giant floating glove a new one.

choices: Palutena has disappeared into her toga!

1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.content:
Master Hand seems to have not yet noticed the girls. So Palutena sneaks away quietly and discreetly, hoping to warn everyone about the diabolical hands whereabouts before she gets spotted.

Master Hand suddenly appears in front of Palutena, startling the goddess and causing her to drop her small friends. Peach holds onto Samus as they fall to ground. Luckily they land safely. But Palutena isn't so lucky. She's face-to-hand with Master Hand, and unsure of what to do. Palutena tries to hit the oversized hand and shove it out of her way, but her small size makes her too weak to do even that.

"Hah hah hah!" Master Hand laughs at the goddess's plight.

He then smacks Palutena to the floor. Peach and Samus run to her side.

"Teeny!" Peach cries.

"Ugh.." Palutena moans. She sees Peach and quickly thinks up a plan. "Peach, you have to take Samus and run. I'll try to distract Master Hand and cover you! Go!"

Palutena stands up and gets ready to face Master Hand by herself. This amuses Master Hand, who again laughs at Palutena, but the goddess of light is undeterred and stands her ground.
Peach starts to worry about her friend, so she runs to the giantess goddess's leg and hugs it.

"Teeny, don't!" Peach shouts.

"Go! Now!" Palutena orders. She shakes her leg, throwing the shrunken princess off of her.

"Listen to her, Peach!" Samus shouts. "We have to go now, or her sacrifice will be in vain!"

"But..." Peach says softly, she feels conflicted.

"We have to! Hurry!" Samus shouts.

"O-Okay!" Peach nods.

Peach gets up and, with Samus in hand, runs away from where Palutena and Master Hand are fighting. She was still hesitant to leave Palutena behind, and now, for the first time perhaps, was wishing she was bigger so she could help Palutena fight. But she knew there was nothing she could do, just run and tell the others. That was her mission now and she was determined to follow it through, and not stop for anything!

"Please be safe when we come back!" Peach said.

"Ahh!" Palutena's cry pierces the air.

"Teeny!?" Peach cries.

"Peach, no! We have to keep going!" Samus shouts. Peach just looks down at her and shakes her head.

The mushroom kingdom princess looks back just in time to see Palutena laying on the floor, and then see Master Hand use some kind of flash attack. The light from the attack blinds the 6 inch tall princess momentarily. Peach instinctively rubs her eyes, but making sure not to drop Samus in the process. Her vision starts to come back when she sees that...

Master Hand notices Samus at the last second and goes after her
1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.content:
Peach could see that Master Hand was gaining on her, the villain was already pretty much on top of her by now! She knew there was no way she could escape him now. The tears continued to flow from her eyes, now more than before, now that she was feeling that she'd let Palutena's sacrifice go in vain. Peach wasn't about to give up though, she keeps running as fast as she can.

"Peach..." Samus says softly upon seeing Peach's sadness.

"I know." Peach says. She runs for a little longer before wiping her tears. "Uhm. I think I've got an idea." She tells Samus.

"What is it?" Samus asks.

Peach brings Samus close and tells her the plan, "We'll need to split up. I'll be the bait, and you escape while I'm caught. Okay?" She explains in a whisper. Samus nods hesitantly. Peach continues, "Okay. You're so small we don't know if Master Hand saw you yet, I hope he didn't didn't."

"I'm not su-" Samus tries to say, but Master Hand suddenly grabs Peach up!

"AAHH!!" Peach cries as she's lifted high into the air. She lets up on her grip on Samus, signaling to the smaller woman that it's time to put her plan into action.

Samus is still in Peach's hand, hesitant to leave the princess, she worries about her bigger friend, even though the blond bounty hunter is in the same position. Samus knows she won't be with Peach much longer. The inch-tall blond hopes Master Hand doesn't see her yet, and jumps off of Peach's hand and onto the floor below. Her finely honed reflexes allow her to land without injury.

Samus looks up and sees Peach still in the hand of that... Hand. Master Hand laughs at his prey. He starts shaking his hand, this causes Peach to roll around awkwardly. Samus winces, and wishes she could do something to help.

Damn! She thinks. Two good women taken down by that monster!

Samus is upset. But she knows what she has to do. The tiny bounty hunter turns and runs away from Master Hand, and her friend. The two had experience with Master Hand before, but neither knew whether or not he had seen Samus, so she tries to slip away while Peach is assaulted.

Master Hand laughs another haunting laugh as Samus runs away. He places Peach on the ground. The shakes the princess received before made her dizzy and not able to move much. She barely gets her bearings back before Master Hand points at her, preparing another shrink no doubt. Peach squeaks, and fears being shrunk.

1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.content:
"Take this, you creep!" Peach suddenly shouts.

The mushroom kingdom princess jumps into the air and smacks the giant hand. Master Hand is caught off guard and tumbles to the floor by Peach's sneak attack. Peach follows up her attack quickly with some rapid punches and kicks, and manages to keep Master Hand down.

"Peach!?" Samus shouts, still running.

"Go! I'll keep him busy!" Peach shouts in between her flurry of attacks.

Samus nods and keeps up her pace. Peach's bravery has taken her by surprise, but she's very grateful for it. But Samus knows Peach won't be able to keep Master Hand down forever, so she runs, making sure Peach's sacrifice is not in vain.

Light shines on Samus as Master Hand lifts up some rubble that was covering her tiny form. Samus knows she's run out of time to think up a plan now. Her only option is to fight.

"Eat it!" Samus squeaks as she leaps into the air to attack Master Hand.

But unfortunately for Samus, her tiny size makes it impossible for her to get anywhere near the floating hand. Her eyes widen as the horrific realization sets in, and she falls back down to the floor.

"NO!" Samus cries from the floor.

Master Hand laughs at the blonde bounty hunters failure. He then picks up the shrunken Samus between his index finger and thumb and carries her into the hall proper. Samus struggles the whole time, she never gives up, but she knows it's pretty much pointless. Master Hand tosses the tiny woman on the floor and prepares his shrinking flash move once more. Samus scrambles to her feet and tries to run away, but in a flash the inch tall bounty hunter shrinks to much less than an inch tall.

Master Hand laughs triumphantly, satisfied that he's gotten rid of three smashers already. Palutena, Peach, and Samus were no match for him at their sizes. And after he reduced them again, he couldn't even see the micro-sized smashers anymore!

1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.content:
Master Hand was about to make his escape, when suddenly, he was struck by an energy attack from behind!

"Not so fast, you creep!" A small, feminine voice shouted.

Master Hand looked back and saw that it was princess Zelda who had called him out. He knew the princess was adept in the magic arts, but never expected to see her use them on him after he had shrank her again.

"You're not going anywhere." Zelda said.

The princess was tiny, very tiny, even by Master Hand's size she was barely the size of his thumb. But she was determined to bring Master Hand down.

---

After she had gotten shrunken to her now 1/3 of a millimeter tall height she quickly found her way out of her toga, by then Master Hand was fighting Toon Link and Pit and Robin. Zelda knew she had to help somehow, but wasn't sure what to do. So she ran towards the fight. As she did, Robin's plan was put into action and Zelda was able to watch as Master Hand shrank out of her sight. Suspecting he was down to a size even she could handle him at, Zelda ran to where he had shrank. But when she got there, she saw that Master Hand was still much bigger than herself. Not giving up, she prepared a sneak attack with her magic. But when she saw him create a portal of some kind and knew she had to act fast.

---

Now, Zelda's sneak attack had worked, and she had Master Hand's attention. The evil glove laughed shortly and charged up another one of his shrinking attacks. Zelda acted quickly again, and cast another spell before Master Hand could use his attack. The spell hit Master Hand dead on.

Master Hand was shocked when the magic energy hit him, quite literally, as Zelda's magic spell was a paralyzing one, meant to keep her enemies frozen in place. Master Hand squirmed in Zelda's magical grip.

Zelda had gotten Master Hand right where she wanted him. But she was too small to do any sort of follow-up attack, and she knew it too. It was the best that she could do just to keep her enemy paralyzed. But the brunette princess knew she couldn't keep up her magic holding spell forever either.

"Ngh!" Zelda moaned from the stress of using her magic.

Master Hand was still stuck, but Zelda was worried about how long she could keep this up, and she started to sweat. She looked over to her much larger friends, who were still looking through her empty toga, and wished she could alert them to her presence somehow, but she couldn't do that without letting Master Hand free. Zelda was stuck between a rock and a hard place.

"Of course we won," Palutean says proudly as the goddess knew the dastard glove would last longer.

"We need to show the others we're okay," Zelda said happily wanting to let the others know that she and plus Palutean are alright despite their externally small size.

"Alright. We will," Paltean said with a smile of her own but adds," But I wonder is that portal still there,"

Zelda wonders as well and the two woman turn their heads to see that the portal is....
1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.title: Victory fo the micro girls

The girls don't make it in time and their friends leave
1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.content:
The portal Master Hand had created was still there. The dark-looking portal wasn't much bigger than the tiny girls, it floated there and hummed a low sound.

"Good, it's still there." Palutena said, she put a hand on her chest and sighed, relieved.

"Do you think there's something important about this portal, Goddess?" Zelda asked.

"Yes." Palutena nodded. "If Master Hand made it, then I bet he was planning on using it to escape. If that's true then..."

"... It could lead us to Tabuu!" Zelda chimed in, finishing Palutena's thoughts.

"I think so. At least, I hope so!" Palutena replied.

"Yes, I as well." Zelda agreed. "But we have to alert the others to our presence."

"Let's do it!" Palutena said.

The tiny girls turned around and looked at the massive forms of their friends that could be seen far in the distance. Zelda and Palutena were only several feet away from them, but at the girls' sizes the distance seemed to be more like several miles away.

"They seem so far away." Zelda said.

"Yeah. But at least they're still looking for you. So them moving shouldn't be a problem!" Palutena replied.

"Yes. Are you up for this?" Zelda asked Palutena.

"Ha ha ha! You're asking me, squirt?" Palutena laughed and poked at Zelda's smaller form. "I'll be fine!"

"... Good. Let's get going then." Zelda said, annoyed by Palutena's teasing.

The micro-sized girls started to run towards their larger friends. The distance seemed grand at their scale, but they were determined to make it there. On the way, Zelda and Palutena caught each other up on what had happened to their respective teams.

"Curse that Master Hand for doing this to our friends!" Palutena shouted, upset at what had happened.

"We've already gotten our revenge, now we just need to get our sizes back, and stop Tabuu once and for all!" Zelda said.

Palutena nodded and the two kept their pace as they ran towards their friends.

Fit nods and the three of three of them start to walk over to where Lucina is.

choices: They can't find the tinier girls
1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.content:
"Let's go and find Peach and Samus." Robin said.

"Agreed." Rosalina said. The tinier girls also seemed to agree.

Robin's new group then set off to find Pit and Toon Link first, they'd be where Palutena's team had been shrunken. Robin and the girls hoped that they might have already found Peach and Samus, and that the remaining girls weren't too small.

Some minutes later, Robin was able to find his way through Palutena's temple to find Pit and Toon Link, near them was Palutena's discarded toga. The youngsters were looking through it closely.

"Pit!" Robin called out to the young angel.

"Robin!" Pit said. Toon Link turned around to face the newcomers.

"How's it going? Did you find anybody yet?" Robin asked.

"Not yet. Did you have any luck?" Pit asked. Robin nodded and Rosalina stepped up.

"We found Zelda and Palutena." Rosalina explained, holding out her hand that was carrying the half inch tall Lucina, who held out her hand carrying the millimeter tall Palutena and smaller girls.

Pit and Toon Link went over and got a closer look at the girls, barely being able to make out Palutena, let alone Wii Fit Trainer and Zelda!

"Zelda, no!" Toon Link said sadly.

"Lady Palutena!?" Pit exclaimed, unsure of whether or not the green speck on Lucina's hand was really his beloved goddess, now reduced to micro size by Master Hand.

"Yeah, it looks like they got hit the hardest." Robin said.

"Don't worry, Toon Link, Pit, they say that they're okay! Despite their sizes.." Lucina squeaked.

"That's good to hear." Toon Link said.

"Lucina, could you please let me talk to pit privately? Put me in his ear so he hear me." Palutena asked.

Lucina nodded to the tinier goddess and relayed her request to Rosalina. The cosmic princess raised her hand to Pit's ear and explained Palutena's request, Pit agreed. Lucina climbed off of Rosalina's hand and walked up Pit's shoulder. Lucina then placed Palutena down inside of Pit's ear. The micro goddess climbed in and immediately shrieked out.

"What is it, Lady Palutena?" Pit asked, worried.

"Ugh, Pit! Your ear is filthy!" Palutena complained loudly as she tried to clean Pit's earwax off her feet.

"Sorry, Lady Palutena. I'll try to keep it clean from now on!" Pit told her. It was awkward to talk to someone he couldn't see, but Palutena was his boss, even if she was near-microscopic in size. So he listened to her intently.

"Now, Pit, I know I'm even smaller then before but I still feel I need to tell you something!" Palutena shouted into Pit's ear. "So about keeping my temple clean..."

Pit's body went rigidly stiff as he understood that he was about to get another lecture from his beloved goddess, whose miniscule size didn't stop her from being strict.

Meanwhile, Lucina and the others had started their search for Peach and Samus. They had no way of knowing where exactly the last two girls had shrunk, so they scoured the area outside of the crack in the wall first.

1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.content:
Peach was sitting down cross-legged on the floor, weeping into her arms. Zelda felt bad for her smaller friend, the mushroom kingdom princess only seemed to come up to her thighs. Zelda approached Peach with an understanding demeanor.

"Peach?" Zelda called out to her friend. Peach then quickly looked up at Zelda, and then started bawling again. Zelda held out her hand to Peach and rubbed the smaller girl's shoulder to comfort her. "It's okay, we've found you! And Palutena is okay too, she's even bigger than us!"

"Th-That's great, but..!" Peach struggled to get the words out through her tears, she broke down and wept into her arms again. "Oh, Samus!"

"So Samus was shrunk again too?" Wii Fit Trainer asked. The miniature fitness expert came over to Peach's side along with Lucina.

"We have to find her." Lucina said.

"I've been trying!" Peach cried. She looked up at her larger friends, if she weren't so worried about Samus's safety she might've been awestruck by how much bigger they were than her. "But she must be so small now!"

"We're here to help now. Don't worry about a thing!" Zelda said, shaking her head.

"Yes. We'll look for her now. You just stay here and rest, you've done enough for now." Lucina told Peach.

"I'll stay with you, okay?" Lucina said. Peach wiped her tears and gave a weak smile and nodded slowly.

"That's okay. I think I should help you guys out. After all, I'm the smallest!" Peach said.

"Do you think Samus is much smaller than you?" Wii Fit Trainer asked.

"I don't know!" Peach replied. "But I have a feeling..."

"Judging by all of our relative sizes it would seem that your feeling might be right." Zelda stated.

"Oh..." Peach said softly.

"Zelda!" Lucina yelled. Zelda realized her words were not helping, she felt bad for being so blunt.

"N-Not that there's not a chance she could be bigger!" Zelda hurriedly said.

"Really!?" Peach asked, her eyes wide.

"Let's just get looking." Wii Fit Trainer said.

"Okay!" Peach exclaimed happily, quickly cheering right up. She and Wii Fit Trainer went off to look for Samus.

"Well, at least she still cheers up fast." Lucina said to Zelda, who smiled nodded.

"What's going on?" Robin asked, his voice booming from high above the micro girls.

Lucina explained the situation to him and then they went and joined the search party for Samus.

"Lady Palutena says that the portal might lead to Tabuu." Pit relays Palutena's message.

"Just as I thought. If that's the case then we need to go through it to take down Tabuu." Robin said.

"Let's go." Toon Link said.

Robin nodded. And the group went back to where most of Toon Link's team shrank. The portal was still there, it's ominous dark glow barely visible to the normal sized members of the group and Robin. Rosalina on the other hand was perfectly capable of seeing the portal, she inspected it.

"Do you see it?" Pit asked.

"Yes." Rosalina turned her attention to the bigger members of the group. "But it's too small for even me to go in."

"We don't even know what's on the other side right now. It could be dangerous." Lucina shouted. Rosalina looked down at the half-inch girl on her hand.

"Yes, it may very well be." Rosalina replied.

"Just let us go through and see for ourselves!" Samus shouted, somehow still able to hear and understand the conversation despite her microscopic size. But only Peach was able to hear her.

"Sammy says to let us go through and check it out!" The mushroom kingdom princess relayed.

"No. Like Lucina said, it could be dangerous. And even if we did let you go through, there's no guarantee that you'll be able to come back through." Rosalina warned with a sigh. "Robin, do you hear this?"

"I got the gist of it, yeah." Robin replied. "And you're right. We should all go through."

"But how?" Pit asked. "We're too big! Unless you're suggesting we shrink ourselves?"

"Maybe." Robin said, now seriously considering the option.

"Hmm..." Toon Link mused. He spoke up. "If you wanted to shrink yourselves, then maybe the hot springs of the temple could still do the trick?"

"Toon Link! You can't seriously think this is a good idea?" Pit shouted.

"I'm just saying. Besides, even though Master Hand is gone, Tabuu is still out there and may be planning a worse attack on the worlds." Toon Link explained his reasoning. Pit grumbled, but accepted the toon's reasons.

"I don't know, I hope they're okay." Toon Link replied. He looked down at Lucina and asked, "Can you see them?"

Lucina heard the question, but didn't answer just yet. She scanned the area where Robin and Rosalina shrank intently, but could not make out the freshly shrunken people. Lucina shook her head.

But then she saw how small the figure appeared to be, she wasn't sure, but it looked like whoever this was is smaller than herself. 1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.content:
Pit and Toon Link headed down the winding hallways of Palutena's temple again, scarf carrying their shrunken friends in hand. It was a quiet walk for them, but down on the scarf, the girls were all shocked to see Rosalina had shrunken so small, they knew she going to be small, but they never expected her to be on par with Palutena's size. On the other hand, the girls were relieved that Robin was lucky enough to keep his size and title of being the biggest member, Peach in particular was especially excited. And Robin was glad to be able to see the micro girls once again.

Things settled down shortly after that and the tiny group enjoyed a comfortable ride on the scarf carriage. With Pit and Toon Link carrying them, the shrunken people felt comfortable that they'd reach the portal soon. When all of a sudden, a loud thud was heard coming from above the temple. Pit and Toon Link stopped and looked at each other.

"Is that what I think it is?" Pit asked Toon Link.

"Tabuu's army?" Toon Link asked. Pit gulped and then nodded.

Toon Link wasn't sure, he shook his head, not wanting it to be true. Then, the roof suddenly tore off! A huge monster had ripped the roof of Palutena's temple clean off! The creature looked down at Pit and Toon Link, who were now very worried. Then, as if to just make matters worse, loud snarls came from down the hall, behind Pit and Toon Link. They looked behind and saw a monster heading their way!

"Oh no! It is Tabuu's army!" Pit shouted.

"Hurry!" Toon Link said.

The two boys ran away from the fast approaching creature, but it was gaining on them, and they knew it. Toon Link stopped running and turned around. Pit, who was left carrying the scarf holding the shrunken people, looked behind at his friend.

"Toon Link! Let's go!" Pit shouted. Toon Link put his hand up behind himself, he then drew his sword.

"Don't worry about me! I'll hold this one off! You just get them to the portal!" Toon Link shouted.

Pit hesitated for a time, but reluctantly agreed and ran off, leaving Toon Link behind. He looked down at the scarf, and explained the situation.

"Toon Link's going to buy us some time! The portal's not far now, I'll get you there and then I'll go back for him!" Pit explained.

"Thank you, Pit! Please hurry!" Robin shouted, as he was the only one still large enough to be heard of the shrunken group. Pit nodded and picked up his pace.

"So this is it." Robin said as he and the others took in their strange new surroundings.

"Looks like we didn't change size. So we have that to be thankful for." Lucina said.

"Yeah! But I wish we did get a little bigger!" Palutena shouted. Lucina looked down at the micro-sized goddess and sighed.

"I'm sorry you didn't grow, but maybe there'll be something to change our sizes in this world." Lucina offered.

"Speaking of which, where are we anyway?" Rosalina asked.

"I'm not sure. But it certainly appears to be Tabuu's realm." Zelda yelled up for Rosalina to hear, but the half-inch Lucina was also capable of hearing Zelda's shouts.

"You're been here before, right?" Lucina asked. "Any advice on how to proceed?"

"No. This world is like a great maze, it's shape and size changes with every visit. Navigating it will be difficult." Zelda explained.

"That's not too promising... Robin, did you hear that?" Lucina said.

"Yes. So this is the great maze, then? I'd heard about it from Marth and Ike before." Robin said as he contemplated how to proceed. "They said about the same thing as Zelda here. And the last time they were here a great hero from a very far off world appeared and helped them at the last second."

"Well, we could certainly use help like that right now." Palutena said.

Robin nodded and continued to think about what to do next. Lucina and the other girls were equally perplexed, there didn't seem to be any immediate direction they should go in, and getting lost in here might spell the doom of them.

1252111212211112121121121112111111112211.content:
It was Bayonetta's gigantic face looming over them, a devilish grin adorning her refined features. None of the shrunken smashers knew who this woman was really, but somehow they didn't feel any sort of doubts about trusting her to help.

"Down here!" Robin shouted, jumping up and down to get the woman's attention.

"Don't worry, darling. I see you!" Bayonetta said. Her distinct accent was sort of exotic to the tiny group.

The newcomer moved back and then pulled apart the sides of the hole that the shrunken group was in, effectively freeing them from their confinements. She then moved to loom over them once more. Bayonetta offered a hand to her tiny finds.

"Come on then, step up and take a ride on me." Bayonetta purred. The woman's clear innuendo made the shrunken people blush, her forwardness was nearly rivaling Palutena's!

Nevertheless, the shrunken group made the climb on board Bayonetta's hand. She stood up and gently raised her hand up to her face to make out her new companions better, and was a little shocked to see some very tiny people there she hadn't noticed before.

"I'm Bayonetta, and you're charmed, I'm sure." Bayonetta winked at the tiny people in her hand, or more specifically, at Robin. The young white-haired man blushed. Bayonetta smiled at his reaction.

"Nice to meet you, Bayonetta." Robin replied, yelling a bit so the witch could hear him.

Bayonetta, huh? Peach thought, intrigued by the newcomer. What can I do with that..?

"Yes, nice to meet you! But where did you come from?" Lucina asked.

"Ahhh, that's ancient history. I don't want to bore you with the details." Bayonetta droned.

"Oh, sorry. I didn't mean to bring up bad memories." Robin yelled. Bayonetta chuckled at this.

"It's fine, love." Bayonetta smiled. Then she shot up straight. "Now! Where were we?"

"Ah, right. Sorry!" Robin shouted. Robin then went ahead and introduced himself and the rest of the shrunken people, and also explained the situation so far. All the while Bayonetta listened intently to the shrunken group's plight. "... And that's about it." Robin finished his explanation.

"Hmm... Well, isn't that just awful!" Bayonetta said with great sympathy.

"Yeah. We were hoping you could help us! And if you knew of some way to gain some size around here!" Lucina shouted.

"Hmm..." She mused, with a finger on her lips, as if she was trying to find the words. She paced around for a moment.
