"Sorry, loves. But I've got no pockets, you see. So I've got to find some way of carrying you!" Bayonetta replied, much to the shrunken smashers chargin.

Bayonetta then tilted her hand ever so slightly, but enough to "deposit" the shrunken smashers into her valley-like cleavage below. The tiny people screamed and shouted as they fell, and started to rethink trusting this devious woman. Most of them, at least. As the princess Peach and goddess Palutena secretly had no qualms about this mode of transport. Indeed, the two shrunken women actually enjoyed the playfulness of it all.

The group landed between Bayonetta's soft mountains safely, and held onto the tinier members too. Bayonetta laughed loudly as she watched them from above. She smiled down at the smashers and gave them a wink.

"Have fun in there! And if you're not, I don't want to hear it! There are two things I hate in this world, and crying babies is one of them!" Bayonetta told the shrunken smashers.

The tinies felt their world shake as Bayonetta started to move again, they were tossed up and down and all around as her large breasts shook with each step she took.

"This isn't what I expected from her!" Lucina shouted.

"Really now, is it alright to trust this Bayonetta?" Rosalina asked.

"I'm sorry. I didn't expect this to happen." Robin apologized for Bayonetta, feeling it was partially his fault for the group's current position somehow.

"It's not your fault, Robin. She's just... Just..." Lucina tried to find the word.

"She's very forward!" Palutena chimed in happily.

"Well, at least one of us is enjoying this." Lucina groaned.

"Make that two!" Peach squeaked with a smile. But her tiny voice was barely above a whisper to the bigger shrunken folk.

"Hey! Focus! You nearly dropped me back there!" Samus shouted at Peach. The microscopic bounty hunter held onto Peach's fingers for dear life. It was hard being a speck to a speck.

"Oh, sorry!" Peach apologized, but her smile never faded.

A few minutes passed as everyone got settled in. The constant shaking stopped, and Bayonetta spoke to her tiny passengers.

"Do you all see what I see?" Bayonetta asked the shrunken group.

Robin and Lucina poked their heads out of Bayonetta's cleavage to see what she was talking about. There were two doors in front of Bayonetta, a red one and a blue one, both had a bright light emanating from behind them.

"Hmm... It seems this world is navigated through doors like these." Bayonetta explained to the tiny smashers.

"I see." Robin said.

"And these doors can lead to anywhere?" Lucina asked.

"Yes, Anywhere." Bayonetta cooed. She pushed up her glasses, and pointed a finger between the doors. "Now, door number one, or door number two?" Bayonetta asked rhetorically. She had already made up her mind.

Samus on the other hand, had been moved from one massive world to another. Zelda's hand alone was big enough to house a city to Samus's perspective.

This, combined with the fact that Samus knew Zelda was only a mere 1/3 of a millimeter tall herself, really drove home how small the formerly proud bounty hunter had become. If Samus's calculations were correct, she couldn't be more than 1/4000 of a millimeter tall herself, or 1/4 of a micrometer. She needed to get some size back, and soon!

"Please let them find a super mushroom, or anything that'll let me grow, even a little! I mean geez!" Samus mumbled to herself.

Then Peach stepped under the row of floating blocks. Being only a little less than half Zelda's size at 1/8 of a mm, Peach was also able to reach the blocks. "I don't know. It's hard to say, but I certainly hope so." Zelda replied.

"No! This is horrible!" Zelda cried.

Samus watched as the Hyrulian princess shrank ever smaller. The miniscule bounty hunter was horrified to see her friend shrink even smaller, she felt bad for Zelda. Thankfully though Zelda hadn't placed her on the ground, otherwise the blonde woman might've shared in the reduction. Samus shivered at the thought of becoming even smaller than she already is.

"No! You're tiny! Y-you and Samus are almost the same size now!" Peach exclaimed. Zelda looked up at Peach, who now towered over her, with fear clear in her eyes.

Zelda's shrinking stopped a moment later when the princess had reached 1/4000th of a millimeter in height, the same size as Samus. Her smaller friends, whom she was previously much taller then had become huge to her. Peach knelt down next to Zelda to get a better look.

Peach looked to be about a mile tall by Zelda's perspective, and when Zelda turned around to check on Samus, she found that she was now equal in size to the blond woman. The 1/4000th of a millimeter tall woman looked normal by Zelda's new, much smaller form. Zelda wept, and was horrified to find herself so small.

"Hey, girls..." Peach whispered as she reached down and carefully picked up the extremely tiny forms of Zelda and Samus.

"Are you both okay?" Peach asked.

"I'm okay.." Samus answered first. Zelda still seemed to be in shock about shrinking even further.

"That's good." Peach said. She paused, and looked at her hand to try and make out Zelda's now micro-sized form, but she couldn't even see a speck of the formally renowned princess's body. "I'm sorry you had to shrink, Zelda. If only I had known it was a super mushroom, then I would've warned you and..." Peach trailed off.

Samus saw that Peach felt bad for what had happened, and decided to say something to Zelda.

"Hey." Samus said to Zelda. The Hyrulian princess shook her head. Samus scowled, and continued, "Please understand that Peach was just trying to protect her."

Zelda gasped and covered her mouth with her hands. Her expression softened as she looked up at Peach's massive, overbearing face which appeared to be overcome with sadness and guilt.

"I know." Zelda said. Then she shouted to Peach, "Please! Don't blame yourself! I.. I'm okay too!"

"Thank you. I'm sure we'll get you some size soon." Peach said with a smile.

"I-I certainly hope so..." Zelda said softly.

"And you look so small, I can hardly hear you!" Zelda told her softly.

Zelda's growth stopped a moment later when the princess had reached an inch in height. Her smaller friends, whom she was previously nearly equal in size had become tiny to her. Zelda knelt down next to them to get a better look.

Peach looked to be about half an inch tall by Zelda's perspective, and when Zelda turned around to check on her smallest friend, she found that she couldn't even make out Samus anymore. The 1/4000th of a millimeter tall woman was microscopic by Zelda's new inch tall form. Zelda gulped, she felt bad for Samus to be stuck at such a puny size.

"Hey, Sammy." Peach said as she reached down and carefully picked up Samus's extremely tiny body.

"Peach, is Samus okay?" Zelda asked. There was a pause as Peach repeated the question to Samus on her hand, and then as Peach listened to the shrunken bounty hunter's reply.

"Sammy says she's okay." Peach answered for her microscopic friend.

"That's good." Zelda said. She paused, and looked at Peach's hand to try and make out Samus's micro-sized form, but couldn't even see a speck of the formally renowned bounty hunter's body. "I'm sorry I put you down, Samus. If only I had known it was a super mushroom, then I would've..." Zelda trailed off.

Samus saw that Zelda felt bad for what had happened, and decided to say something. She shouted into Peach's ear. Peach heard her and smiled.

"Hey." Peach said to Zelda. The mushroom kingdom princess shook her head. "Sammy says it's okay, she says she understands that you were just trying to protect her."

The world around the shrunken group had changed size in a major way, or at least they thought it did. It was hard to tell for them now that they were in another new world. This new area looked blocky and confusing, like a series of massive platforms that went on forever. The world was dark lit and ominous, a sure sign of Tabuu's dark powers and the villain's presence in this world.

"We shrank again! Is everyone okay?" Robin asked as he turned around and saw, much to his surprise, that everyone was the same size now!

"Yes, we're alright." Zelda answered with a smile, happy that she and the other were all on equal footing now, but worried that they shrank too small.

"Yes. But how small are we now?" Wii Fit Trainer wondered aloud. Before anyone could even begin to guess, Lucina ran up to Robin and hugged him close.

"Oh, Robin! We're even smaller now!" Lucina cried. She gave her boyfriend a little smooch. "But I'm glad we're the same size again..." She whispered to him. Robin blushed and smiled. Then, a commotion!

"Where's Sammy?!" Peach cried.

"We lost her!?" Palutena asked.

Robin and the group surveyed the area for any sign of Samus, but didn't see her at all! It was like the galactic bounty hunter had disappeared, or...

"Watch out, everyone! I think Samus might have shrunk even further!" Robin warned the group. The whole group gasped as the realization set in, and to make matters worse, since they couldn't find a doll-size Samus around, that meant she was down to a really small size!

"Again!? But she was already so small!" Peach cried.

"I see. So we shrank to Samus's size, while Samus shrank even more." Wii Fit Trainer noted.

"Then that means..." Palutena started to say, but stopped herself and shook her head, not wanting to think of how small that made her and the others, not to mention poor Samus! Rosalina noticed Palutena's grief and decided to step in.

"Let's make finding Samus our top priority for now! Then we can worry about the rest!" Rosalina said.

"Yeah!" Everyone agreed.

With that, all of the shrunken group got down to look for Samus amongst the specks on the floor. They knew she'd be extremely tiny, but they wondered just how small she might be now.

125211211111221.content:
While Peach shrank herself back down to 1/4000th of a millimeter tall, Robin's group was in the middle of a conundrum.

So far, the other tiny smashers had faced perilous traps, tricky puzzles, and mini Primids on their path. Not to mention the many innuendos, courtesy of Bayonetta, that they had to endure all the while. The Mushroom Kingdom underground had indeed proved to be a harrowing challenge for the shrunken smashers, but they had conquered everything that had come their way.

Now though, the group had entered a room that offered a different challenge then the rest. One that involved size changing.

"Not again!" Lucina complained. Her and the group had had enough size changing for one lifetime, and she was tired of it.

"Now, now, Lucina. It might not be that bad." Robin tried to comfort his girlfriend.

"Yes. This is a simple game of chance." Rosalina added. The millimeter tall cosmic blonde had to speak her words louder so her inch-tall companions could hear.

"Just pick a mushroom and eat it. That's all you have to do." Wii Fit Trainer said.

"Easy for you to say. It's not your size on the line!" Lucina retorted.

So it was that the room that Robin's group had entered had only two things in it. A note explaining the rules of the room, and two identical mushrooms.

The note read, "To pass this room, one of you must eat one of the mushrooms. Shrink or grow. This is your only option. Only then will the warp pipe leading out appear."

"You guys can do whatever you like. I don't want anything to do with this one." Palutena said.

"Hmm, what's the matter?" Bayonetta cooed. Poking at the tinier Palutena. "Afraid of getting a little smaller, little one?" Palutena knocked Bayonetta's huge finger away.

"Little one..?" Palutena said sarcastically. She let the insult slide though. Bayonetta wasn't going to goad her into risking what little size she had left.

"What are we doing?" Wii Fit Trainer asked. The smallest member of the group, at only 2/3 of a millimeter tall, seemed to only want to hurry up and get out of here.

"Let's leave it up to Robin. That's what you all usually do, yes?" Bayonetta asked. She clung to the young man's arm. "Just don't choose me."

"Or me!" Lucina pleaded. The blue-haired swordswoman clung to Robin's other arm.

Robin blushed at having two lovely ladies on both of his arms. He wasn't sure how to proceed. On one hand, literally, he didn't want to risk anyone getting smaller. But on the other hand, there was a chance of growing from using the mushrooms, similar to what happened at the start of the journey.

"Well, okay..." Robin said meekly. He chose...

Robin felt the mushroom's effects immediately after finishing it. To the white haired tactician, the world seemed to expand and grow all around him. He was shrinking again!

"Damn. Looks like I picked the wrong one!" Robin said incredulously as he shrank quickly down, smaller and smaller. Before long, he was smaller than Lucina! His blue haired girlfriend ran to his side, but was helpless to do anything but watch.

"Robin, no!" Lucina cried in shock and fear of when the young man would stop shrinking.

The other girls were equally surprised by the turn of events. But there was little they could do but try and comfort Robin as his height diminished further.

"It's okay. I'm just glad none of you got any smaller." Robin said bravely.

"That's the spirit! Besides, I think you're rather cute like this." Bayonetta said with a mischievous grin.

"Bayonetta! How could you say something like that at a time like this!?" Rosalina shouted.

"What? Too soon?" Bayonetta asked.

Robin didn't mind though, he was too focused on watching both Bayonetta and Lucina seemingly grow into giantesses before him, they must've been at 40 feet tall by comparison. A moment later, his shrinking stopped. He was now eye-level with Palutena and Rosalina, putting him down to only 1 millimeter in height!

"Welcome to the micro world." Palutena said with a weak smile.

"Are you alright?" Rosalina asked.

"I'm okay." Robin nodded. "I can't believe you all managed at this size for so long. Bayonetta and Lucina look like giants to us now! I can only imagine what I must've seemed like to you..."

Lucina knelt down next to her shrunken boyfriend. He looked like a doll to her now.

"I'm sorry, Robin. I should have taken the mushroom." Lucina said softly to him. But Robin shook his head.

"I'm fine, really." He said with a smile. His comparatively giantess girlfriend was quite the sight, he had to admit. Bayonetta was no slouch either, the other giantess had been eyeing him seductively since he shrank. Robin shook his head and continued, "But I think you'll have to take charge for now, okay?"

"Yes. I'll do my best." Lucina nodded. Then she looked down at Robin hesitantly. "Um, should I pick you up?"

Robin blushed, despite himself. Lucina was cute when she was smaller than him, but now that she was bigger, he thought she looked just as well. The reversal of sizes was something incredible to him, and he could tell Lucina felt the same way.

"Er, yes." Robin finally managed.

Robin looked up at Lucina as he stepped onto her hand, she smiled down at him, as if to assure him that she'd protect him now.

Once everyone was on board, Lucina slowly got up. Then, the sound of a pipe appearing rang through the room. Lucina and Bayonetta turned to the back of the room and saw that a green pipe was now sticking out of the the wall.

"Looks like it's our way out." Lucina said.

"I hope so. This underground segment has been dreadfully boring!" Bayonetta complained. She looked down at Robin on Lucina's hand, and grinned. "Until now, that is..." She teased.

"Control yourself, woman. We should go see what's next in store for us." Lucina said, pulling her hand closer to her chest defensively.

"Yes, he is. But, you see, I am the master of this place." Shadow Rosalina explained.

"Why do this, then? Why help me by letting me grow?" Lucina asked, hoping to get Shadow Rosalina distracted by asking her questions.

Shaodw Rosalina looked hesitant to reply at first, but then answered honestly, "I can't help it." She told Lucina. "I may have been created by Tabuu, but some part of me still wants to see you all succeed. Even now, I can't help but help you by telling you this!"

"Hey, doesn't it sound like she's been made to act a bit too much like Rosalina?" Palutena asked. Her and the other micro-sized smashers overhearing the conversation.

"Yes..." Rosalina said cautiously.

Meanwhile, the Shadow Rosalina seemed torn over revealing that much to her enemies, while at the same time wanting to help them. Lucina took advantage of the larger woman's confusion and rushed at Shadow Rosalina's slipper covered foot, hoping to trip up the larger woman. But Shadow Rosalina was quick to recover herself, and avoided the attack by merely stepping away from Lucina's tiny form. Lucina cursed her small size, but kept up her approach. However, Shadow Rosalina again was too fast, and bent down and plucked the small woman up from the ground.

"Ungh!" Lucina struggled in Shadow Rosalina grasp for a moment, before the shadow let up on her and opened her hand, allowing the shrunken woman to lay on her palm.
Lucina panted lightly on her captor's hand, and took a moment to catch her breath. Then, Lucina felt a giant finger grab hold of her chin and then lift it up, making her face the shadow.

"Ah, ah." Shadow Rosalina wagged a finger at the tiny blue haired woman.

"Let me go!" Lucina shouted.

Shadow Rosalina smiled, but softly shook her head at the tiny woman. She then carried Lucina over to the blocks in the room and, using her free hand, hit one, making another mushroom pop out. Shadow Rosalina picked up the 'shroom and raised it to Lucina's level.

"Would you like to have another mushroom, sweetie?" Shadow Rosalina asked with a smile.

"As if I would take something from you... willingly!" Lucina yelled her response.

"Mmm. Oh well, it's not for you anyway." Shadow Rosalina said. She turned her attention to the other tiny smashers, she went over to the biggest, the inch tall Bayonetta.

Shadow Rosalina bent down and gently slipped Lucina off of her hand, back down to the ground.

"Waagh!" Lucina cried as she tumbled down Shadow Rosalina's hand. It was rough going, but she landed safely on the ground.

Shadow Rosalina then lowered the mushroom down to Bayonetta.

"For me?" Bayonetta asked, pointing to herself. The Umbran witch walked over to the mushroom.

"Oh, no...!" Shadow Rosalina said, quickly recoiling her hand away from the miniature witch. Bayonetta stopped in her tracks and raised an eyebrow at the giantess. Shadow Rosalina smiled down at her, and lowered the 'shroom again. "Well, it could be if you take it, I suppose. But this is meant for Miss Rosalina." She said.

"Hmmm... That's quite the offer." Bayonetta said, placing her finger on her lip, as if pondering her next move.

"Wait, Bayonetta! I don't like this. This shadow is acting too strangely to be trusted!" Robin yelled.

Bayonetta looked down him and the other smaller smashers, then up to Shadow Rosalina. "Hold on a moment, would you?" She asked. "I have to consult my cute little friends."

Shadow Rosalina smiled patiently. Bayonetta smiled back, then looked down at the smaller smashers on her hand and awaited their desicion.

"She's asking for me specifically. I think I have to do this." Rosalina said.

"It might be a trap." Wii Fit Trainer said.

"Might be? It most certainly IS a trap!" Palutena shouted disapprovingly. "We can't trust anything that was made by Tabuu, no matter how much it looks like Rosalina."

"That's true that Tabuu isn't to be trusted. But this, shadow of me, doesn't seem like any other Tabuu creations we've seen so far." Rosalina said.

"Do you trust her?" Robin asked.

"I'm not saying that. But still, if it's meant for me, I think I should do it." Rosalina said.

"If it were up to me, I'd do it just to see what happens." Wii Fit Trainer said.

"Good thing it's not up to you then." Palutena murmured quietly.

A louder voice spoke up, "Well, lovelies?" It was Bayonetta who asked. "What's the verdict?"

Bayonetta nods and with her free hand picks the tinier Rosalina and raises the palm that holds Rosalina up. The mushroom hits Rosalina and the space princess.....

choices: The mushrooms catch up to the tiny smashers
The group gets away, but what about Rosalina?
12521121111122111112111.content:
As soon as the mushroom touched Rosalina it dissipated into a big puff of smoke. Rosalina and the smashers were caught off guard by the "smoke bomb" shroom, with Rosalina coughing up as the smoke enveloped her, soon nobody was able to make out the cosmic princess through the thick smoke.

"No, it was a trap!" Robin shouted, as he and the others worried for Rosalina's well-being. The cosmic princess was small enough already, if her shadow made her shrink even further just now then she'd be less than a speck to regular sized people.

Meanwhile, Shadow Rosalina laughed at her real self's plight.

"Here we go." Shadow Rosalina smirked, but then groaned as she felt something hit her feet. She looked down to see Lucina trying to hit her with all the might her tiny body could muster, but it didn't hurt the Shadow at all.

"What is this?!" Lucina demanded to know.

"Take a look for yourself." Shadow Rosalina smiled warmly down at the shrunken woman and pointed to where Rosalina was. Lucina looked and could see that the smoke around her friend was dissipating. The blue-haired woman gasped as she saw what the mushroom had done to Rosalina.

Rosalina was now about 4 1/2 feet tall, or about half her normal size. The newly tall(comparatively) woman gasped at how small everything looked all of a sudden.

"Oh my..." She said, examing herself as well as her smaller surroundings.

"She's huge!" Palutena exclaimed happily.

"Indeed." Wii Fit Trainer nodded.

"Not quite." Lucina interjected. "From my point of view, she looks not even... five feet high, I think."

"Rosalina!" Lucina yelled as she ran over to her freshly grown friend. Rosalina looked down at her smaller companion, shocked to see how small the blue-haried woman looked now.

"Lucina! You look so small!" Rosalina said.

"And you so large." Lucina replied with a smile. She motioned for Roslaina to pick her up, which Rosalina did. "Thank you."

"Of course." Rosalina giggled. "It's been a while since I could do this for someone..."

"Yes. And it's because of me." Shadow Rosalina said, walking up to the pint-sized Rosalina, making the smaller woman gasp audibly.

In her awe of being grown, Rosalina hadn't yet noticed how her dark doppelganger was still full-sized, and still much larger than herself. Rosalina took a step back from the Shaodw, while little Lucina braced herself in Rosalina's palm.

"I don't know what you're plotting, but I'm not going down without a fight!" Rosalina warned her faker, who just chuckled at the minute woman's claim, but then she stopped abruptly and smiled down at Rosalina.

"Oh no, I wouldn't dare want to fight you." Shadow Rosalina said, feigning fear by recoiling.

"Stop lying! If you're not here to fight, then what!? Why grow Rosalina and I?" Lucina shouted from Rosalina's palm.

Shadow Rosalina sighed. "Very well. I can't keep this up much longer. It's like fighting myself, well, in more ways than one!"

"What do you mean?" Lucina asked.

"I told you before. I may have been created by Tabuu, but something, I think it's Rosalina's good nature, is making me want to help you all. This game hasn't been fair to you all from the beginning, but you've made so much progress! You just need a little more help and you'll be able to make it..." Shadow Rosalina suddenly cut herself off. "No. I shouldn't say. But there is something you should know..."

"What is it?" Rosalina asked cautiously.

"There are more Shadows of you all, created by by Tabuu, like me. If you defeat these Shadows you'll be able to change your size as you please." Shadow Rosalina revealed.

"As we please? In that case, we should just take you down!" Lucina said.

"Please don't!" Shadow Rosalina exclaimed. "I'm not here to fight you, but I can't just let you pass without trying to defeat you all.." Shadow Rosalina looked down, as if trying to make a choice. "So, I'm sorry, but..."

"Be careful..." Rosalina told Lucina. She turned back to the others. "She's going to do something!"

Just then, Shadow Rosalina floated just above the ground and hovered away from the smashers, before disappearing into a sudden darkness that enveloped her.

"I'll give you all your chances!" Even though she was gone, Shadow Rosalina's voice could be heard throughout the room.

The room then shook for a moment, knocking everyone still in there off their feet. And Lucina, who Rosalina had been holding, tumbled over to the smaller smashers nearby. Rosalina recovered quickly though and went to grab them and find a way out of the room, but then gasped as she saw the cause of the earlier rumble.

A large pack of mushrooms had been dropped into the room, all of various shapes and sizes and colors. Worst of all though, the mushrooms were headed straight for the smaller group of smashers, who still hadn't recovered from their fall.

"Everyone, look out!" Rosalina shouted, and tried to run to her friends aid, but another quake knocked her off her feet again. Surprisingly though, it seemed only Rosalina was affected by this quake, as she noticed the other her allies were still able to get up and recover.

"Oh, no, not good!" Palutena shouted as she got up and saw the army of mushrooms heading for her and her friends.

"This is bad! Can everyone move?" Robin shouted.

"Yeah, looks like everyone is up!" Bayonetta said. The Umbran witch was already running from the coming mushrooms.

"Not everyone! Look! Rosalina is still down!" Lucina pointed out.

"What?!" Robin looked and saw that the giantess Rosalina was trying to get to her feet, but kept stumbling and falling back down. "Damn! Could this be another trick of her Shadow's!?"

"I don't know, but if she can't get up on her own, then she's screwed! There's no way our tiny bodies can help her up!" Lucina shouted as she tried to run to Rosalina to help her anyway.

"We'll think of something, let's just get away from those mushrooms, we don't know what they'll do to us!" Robin said. Everyone agreed and retreated.

"I wonder what each one does..." Wii Fit Trainer mused as she ran.

"Not the time!" Palutena scolded her.

1252112111112211111211112.title: Will the smashers grow or shrink together?

choices: Eventually 2 or more smashers meet up
12521121111122111112111121.content:
In an instant, Robin and the girls felt their surroundings change dramatically as they shifted sizes together. For the shrunken smashers, it seemed for one instance they were in the underground room fleeing the mushrooms, then in the next, transported to a massive room, the size of which boggled each of their minds.

"I hope the others are alright." Robin said. From his point of view, the room went on forever, and there was no sign of the others. It was like this for the girls as well.

"Damn that Shadow Rosalina! When I see her again, she's going to pay!" Lucina shouted in anger. Wasting no time, the blue-haired swordswoman ran off in search of her friends.

"Hmm..." Was all Bayonetta could say when she saw how much smaller she had become. The Umbran witch wasn't afraid, but she was worried that she might not be found if she was so small, and of her friends as well.

"My goodness... She just couldn't help herself, could she?" Rosalina thought as she stared up at the ceiling, far, far above her head. Of all the smashers, Rosalina was the most disappointed, for she thought she was going to be at a reasonable size for a while longer, only to end up shrinking to smaller then she had ever been before.

"No way..." Palutena gasped as she realized what happened.

"Incredible..." Wii Fit Trainer said in awe at the massive expanse around her.

The tiny smashers soon set out on their own ways to find each other, but at their extremely miniscule sizes making any sort of progress would take some time. Minutes passed without any of them finding each other, then longer with still no sign of their friends. Their micro 1/4000th mm height made going just a mere millimeter a massive undertaking. And in the dark, empty space of the underground, it was hard from them to tell where they were going, and if they weren't just going in circles. But they pressed on as time passed, each smasher determined to make contact with at least one of their friends.
12521121111122111112111121.title: Everyone is shrinking!

choices: Let it go and find the others
12521121111122111112111122.content:
In an instant the smashers felt their bodies change as they all shifted in size simultaneously. Up they went as they all returned to their normal heights!

"Wh-What!?" Palutena gasped as she realized that she had grown considerably.

"I think... We're back to our normal heights." Rosalina stated. She smiled when she saw that she was once again the tallest of the bunch, standing at least a head over even Robin.

"Are you sure...? Perhaps it just feels that way in this cramped underground." Lucina said in awe. Hardly believing that she could be normal sized again.

"Yes, look at us." Robin said.

Lucina did just that and could see that everyone had indeed grown, that much was clear. But then she noticed that their growth wasn't equal, everyone was just slightly separate from each other in height, similar to how it should be if they were all normal. All expect for Rosalina that is, who was the tallest of them all by far.

"Sure is." Bayonetta said as she looked at all of her companions at their normal heights with a hungry look in her eyes. "Mmm, you all look so... big."

"Bayo, you're not thinking of what I think you are, are you?" Palutena asked, going over to the tall witch.

"This is incredible!" Lucina exclaimed happily. She ran over to her boyfriend and hugged him tight, noting with joy that Robin was just a little taller than herself, just as she remembered him being before all the shrinking business started.

"Yes. But I still wonder what would've happened if we all shrank instead. Oh well." Wii Fit Trainer said.

"Seriously? You're so weird, Fit!" Palutena laughed as she teased the pale woman. The group joined her in laughing, everyone thrilled to be normal again.

"But still..." Lucina said with a serious tone. "Why would Rosalina's Shadow do this for us?"

"She did say she was fighting herself, maybe Rosalina's good nature was making her want to help us after all?" Robin offered.

"I see. If that's the case it makes sense. I certainly wouldn't want to shrink any of you." Rosalina said.

"So, Rosie here is just such a good person that even Tabuu can't make her completely evil?" Palutena asked.

"Ha ha, I'd believe it." Robin said.

"Forget about all that! What do we need to do now, leader?" Bayonetta asked.

"Well, for one, we need to find Peach and her team as soon as possible." Robin said. "Then we can go from there and try and get out of this place."

"Good idea. Let's get going." Lucina said.

Bayonetta was shocked that they could all be so casual after everything. They were all, after all, fully grown and completely naked. She didn't want to press the issue, especially not if she could get cute little Peachie and her friends in later, but still she felt hot and ready looking at everyone. She mused...

125211211111221111121111221212.content:
"I think we should take the smaller pipe." Robin said.

"That sounds like a good choice." Lucina agreed, not wanting to be too much smaller anytime soon. Five inches or so was bad, but the blue-haired woman couldn't imagine life at 1/4000th of a millimeter tall.

"Indeed. I agree." Wii Fit Trainer added.

"Yeah. Besides, I trust Peach and the others made it through their part of this place intact." Palutena said cheerfully. Though she was dreading having to get smaller, she did indeed have a good deal of faith in Peach, Zelda and Samus, and was looking forward to seeing them on the outside.

"If anything, I'm willing to guess that Peach and the others are waiting for us as we speak." Rosalina said with a light giggle.

"Mm-hmm! And I can't wait to see Peach and her cute little friends either!" Bayonetta smiled.

"But still, I wonder how small I'd feel at one four-thousandth of a millimeter..." Wii Fit Trainer said, seemingly seriously contemplating the possibility.

"Well, let's not risk it." Robin said, and he headed for the tiny pipe. The girls followed his lead.

"Wait, how's this supposed to work anyway? Will it just know what pipe we picked?" Palutena asked.

Then, as if on cue, five blocks appeared suddenly and, without anyone touching them, produced five mushrooms.

"Oh, right. There are only five mushrooms, but six of us!" Lucina stated.

"Does that mean one of us gets to stay normal-sized? How would that person fit through the pipe then?" Palutena wondered aloud.

"I'm not sure. But if that's the case one of us is going to have to stay at their normal size. We'll have to decide who." Robin said.

"Um, well, you better decide fast, because those shrooms are heading our way!" Palutena exclaimed.

The mushrooms seemed to hone in on each smasher in the room, going after whoever was closest to them.

"Oh, not again!" Lucina yelled.

The smashers ran away from the mushrooms, but now that they were all normal-sized again, they hadn't taken into consideration how much smaller the room now was to them, and they were soon cornered. They knew they had to make their choice now as to who would be the one to stay normal size. To add to the challenging dilemma, the group had no way of knowing which mushrooms did what, as they all looking similar. All they knew was that one would make one person 5 inches tall, while the rest would make them smaller than that.

In the end, they decided...

"So the pipe grew after those mushrooms were used....." Robin comments and then looks at the ground to see what the sizes are the girls. He sees the girls tiny forms and sees that first he sees is the tallest and the last one he sees is the smallest. The order is....

12521121111122111112111122121212.content:
The order of the group, from tallest to smallest, was now; Robin at his full height, Bayonetta at 5 inches, Wii Fit Trainer at 3 inches, Palutena at 2 inches, Rosalina at a single inch tall, and Lucina was the smallest of them all at a mere quarter of an inch in height.

Robin was relieved that the groups sizes were not nearly as small as before, but still felt bad that the girls had to shrink while he got to stay full sized.

"Well now, that wasn't so bad." Bayonetta said, quite enjoying her new size, and role as the second largest member of the group. Robin noted the Umbran witch was almost doll-sized.

"Yes. I'm smaller, but bigger then before." Wii Fit Trainer stated. The 3 inch woman stretched out, enjoying how roomy the place had gotten.

"But we were so close to staying normal size!" Palutena complained. The miniscule goddess pouted and sat down, waiting for everyone to get accustomed to their new sizes.

"It was a cruel thing my shadow did. Tricking us into a false sense of security." Rosalina said. The cosmic princess looked rather upset a only an inch tall.

"B-But..! Why am I the smallest!?" Lucina shouted. It was hard for the other girls to hear the micro-sized swordswoman, Rosalina and Palutena could hear her fine, but anyone bigger had to concentrate on the tiniest girl's voice to make out her words.

Robin had a especially hard time spotting the ultra tiny Lucina, only noticing a tiny blue-haired speck on the ground. Palutena could see Robin staring down at his minute girlfriend, so she picked up the tiniest woman and held her up for Robin to see.

"Oh, Lucina..." Robin said softly. "I wish now that I had been the one to take the mushrooms..."

"Hey, now! Don't let him speak such nonsense!" Lucina told Palutena, who relayed her message.

"You're right. What's done is done. Now is the time to move on, and hopefully find Peach and the others soon!" Robin said.

"Exectly right, Robin, my dear." Bayonetta agreed. "If we're all ready?" She asked, ready to move on out of the underground.

"Yes. We've spent enough time down as is." Rosalina replied and followed Bayonetta's lead.

"I'll say, it feels like its been over a year since we got here!" Palutena, who still held the 1/4 inch Lucina, groaned.

Peach giggled, and turned her head to Robin.

"This is so humiliating...." Samus complained to Zelda inside Peach's ear, wiping the earwax off of her feet and legs. "Couldn't she have found a better place for us?"

12521121111122111112111122121212111.title: The next location is Bowser's Castle.

125211211111221111121111221212121111.content:
After a break at the Mushroom Hill Plains, Peach, the shrunken smashers, carried by Robin, reached Bowser's Castle. With its dark, stormy clouds above, and lava pits below, there could be no doubt that this was indeed the infamous Bowser's castle. It was an imposing sight, and being all small and in the nude didn't help the girls confidence, but they had long since grown accustomed to such things.

Robin, being the largest member of the gang, crossed the bridge leading into the castle itself without a second thought. Then, the group was welcomed to the evil koopa king's castle by magma jumping up from lava pits below and soaring over the bridge. It made the girls nervous.

"Wait a minute, Robin, are you sure it's safe to just head in like this?" Lucina asked. Robin gave the question a moments thought, but kept pressing on, wanting nothing more than to put an end to this game that Tabuu had kept him and his friends in for far too long.

"You're right. Peach.." Robin said and meant to continue on, but Peach suddenly zipped herself up in size, coming up just a little bit shorter than Robin.

"Yes?" Peach asked, smiling. Robin was taken back by Peach's sudden change in size and had to stop in his tracks for a moment, but quickly collected himself and moved forward. Peach followed behind him quickly.

"Is there anything we should know before heading in?" Robin asked.

"Hmm..." Peach tried to think. "Well, I usually get taken here when I'm kidnapped."

"No, Peach, something useful!" Lucina yelled.

"Oh! It's really, really big inside! Like a maze." Peach exclaimed gleefully. Lucina groaned, Peach's happy-go-lucky nature really could get on her nerves sometimes. She wondered how Peach ever won her battle against her shadow.

"Let me help." Rosalina chimed in, grabbing everyone's attention. "Bowser's castle is usually filled with traps and his soldiers around."

"That doesn't sound good." Palutena said.

"No, it doesn't. But I don't think we'll need to worry about any of that." Rosalina explained. "See, we're not really in the mushroom kingdom or Bowser's castle, this is still a world made by Tabuu. It's not real, so I doubt Bowser or any of his minions would be here. If we're especially lucky, we might even avoid having to go through any traps or puzzles."

"That's a relief." Lucina said, tired of dealing with puzzles that took away her size.

"You said it. Let's hope for the best." Palutena agreed.

"Right." Robin said. "But Rosalina's Shadow is still out there. And if she's hiding anywhere, chances are it'll be here."

"... I can only hope that's not the case." Rosalina stated.

"Shadow or not, let's just hurry and find a way out of this dreary world already, why don't we?" Bayonetta told the group.

"Bayonettie's right! Let's go, Robin!" Peach said and then ran ahead of the tactician.

"Wait, Peach!" Robin shouted.

It was no use though, as Peach had already gone inside the castle by the time Robin reacted. Robin shook his head and ran after the blonde. He, along with the tinier women in his hands, entered the castle front doors and saw Peach there, unharmed. Relived, Robin sighed and went to her side.

"Thank goodness you're alright, Peach. Please, don't run off like the again." Robin told her.

"Oh, sorry!" Peach apologized. She looked around the room. "Look at this place, it's all, empty..!"

Robin had to agree with her there. The inner castle was dark and dreary indeed, but also seemed to only consist of a single room that seemed to go on for a long ways in all directions. Robin couldn't even see the furthest walls.

"This must be Tabuu's doing. He couldn't recreate the castle completely, or maybe just didn't want to, and ended up with this!" Rosalina explained.

"But wait, if that's true that he meant for this to be the final area of this world, then doesn't that mean..." Palutena started to put the pieces together.

"Boss fight." Wii Fit Trainer finished for the goddess.

"If that's the case, best to be on guard. Peach..?" Robin looked to his only equally-sized companion. She nodded back at him, and the two entered further into Bowser's Castle, prepared to fight.

125211211111221111121111221212121111211.content:
Princess Peach was struck by the yellow ball of magical energy. To the unaware Smashers, it appeared to have come out of nowhere, and neither of them had any time to prepare, much less dodge the oncoming attack. Peach's body seized up as soon as she was hit, and she fell to the ground a moment later, motionless.

"Peach!" Robin yelled, and quickly ran over to the blonde princess's side.

In her current state, Peach could neither move nor speak. Even her eyes stayed still, almost lifeless as Robin looked after his frozen companion, likening her condition to that of being turned into a trophy or something similar, only she was still flesh and blood.

"C'mon, Peach! Get up!" Robin ushered his friend, shaking her as he was unsure of what else he could do. He cursed his lack of foresight inwardly, blaming himself for Peach's helpless state.

"Ha ha ha! It's no use!" Shadow Robin laughed triumphant. Robin looked over and saw the evil version of himself had walked into the light. He glared at the mockery. The smaller girls gasped as they saw that both Robin and Lucina did indeed have shadows of themselves hiding in the decrepit castle.

"Not another one!" Rosalina cried.

"Oh. There he is." Wii Fit Trainer said, as if expecting the shadow of Robin to appear.

"Shadow Robin... I can't believe it..." Palutena said.

"You'd better believe it. We've got two fakers on our hands now!" Bayonetta exclaimed.

"This doesn't look good, Peach is out and Robin is now up against two opponents." Lucina worried for her boyfriend's safety, and wished there was something she could do to help him.

"This isn't like some pathetic spell you're used to casting. Oh no, she's going to be that way for a while." Shadow Robin said.

"So it looks like your on your own, lover boy." Lucina said coldly, then sprung into action, charging at the real Robin with her hand on her sword, ready to fight.

Robin flinched, unprepared for the sudden attack. But the tactician quickly recovered and got into a fighting stance. He was weaponless, but had to be on guard for whatever Lucina and Robin threw at him...

1252112111112211111211112212121211112112.title: Two agasint one and two who were forgotten.

choices: Were too late as Robin struggled against his opponents
1252112111112211111211112212121211112112.content:
Zelda and Samus both got up with aches, they'd both narrowly avoided being hit by Shadow Robin's spell. But when Peach froze up and hit the floor, they'd been taken for a terrible ride that left them out cold for a moment, only just now had they recovered enough to stand.

"That was a pain... Are you okay, Samus?" Zelda asked her equally tiny partner. The miniature blonde bounty hunter nodded.

"I'm fine, but what did they do to Peach?" Samus asked. The astoundingly ginormous form of the mushroom kingdom princess lay completely still before the microscopic female smashers. Even though they were both incredibly tiny, or perhaps because of their size, they were both able to tell that Peach wasn't just knocked out cold like they were moments ago, but instead caught in some strange frozen state. Zelda, knowing of magic, sized up the situation quickly.

"She must've been hit by some kind of freezing spell. She's still alive, and aware of what's going on, she just can't move or speak at all." Zelda explained.

"That sounds awful." Samus said, feeling bad that Peach was in such a sorry state. For the umpteenth time, Samus cursed her small height and wished she could've done something to protect Peach. The belittled bounty hunted thought enough was enough, and she wanted to help now, "What can we do, Zelda?"

"I-I'm not sure..." Zelda replied, seemingly thinking about what ways she and Samus could possibly help Peach at their impossibly pitiful sizes.

"Think! There must be something! I'm sick and tired of just waiting around in someones hand all helpless!" Samus shouted. Zelda paused for a moment to think some more.

"Okay, okay." The Hylian princess started, pacing towards Peach's face. "There might something we can do after all..."

Intrigued by Zelda's sudden idea, Samus followed Zelda. "Well, what is it?" She asked.

"I think I can still use a spell well enough to help a little bit, but it's not going to be easy..." Zelda warned.

"That's fine. Anything we can do to help Peach." Samus insisted.

"I was hoping you'd say that..." Zelda smiled, and went on to explain her plan. "It's actually much simpler than you might think. All we need to do it get Peach to sneeze, and that will break the spell, and that's why we're going to climb into Peach's nose and then..."

Samus stopped in tracks. "Wait..! Sneeze..?" She asked, dumbfounded.

"That's right. See, the spell does indeed freeze somebody's body if it hits, but if that person winds up in life-threatening danger or has to react to something inside themselves, like sneezing, then the spell will break and the person will be able to move again." Zelda explained, sounding oddly calm about the whole thing despite the ridiculousness of it.

"I see... I think. So that's why the Shadow's aren't attacking Peach?" Samus wondered.

"Yes. If they were to put her in life-threatening danger, she'd 'wake up' so to speak. It explains why they're focusing their attacks on Robin." Zelda replied.

"Those bastards!" Samus shouted in anger. She picked up her pace and began to run towards Peach's monolithic visage. "C'mon, we've got to hurry and get this princess to sneeze!"

Zelda nodded and started running too. Soon, both girls were nearly there and...

Peach is so much in thought when she looks her nose she sees there's only one speak on her nose.Peach starts to mently freak out until she hears a voice in her right hear.

"Peach! It's me Samus!"

Peach sighs in relief in her own mind as she hears Samus yells more.

"Looks like you can hear me! Good thing Zelda's telepathic magic is able work when I'm this far away from her and not use much magic!"

Peach figures that Zelda must be the speak on her nose and the micro size Hyrule princess is able to Peach reactions from her eyes. Peach continues to listen to Samus yell.

"Zelda believes that if we're able to make you sneeze, you can move again! So we made up a plan, we're going to try make you sneeze while the shadow Robin and Lucina are to busy focusing on fighting Robin! Then you'll pretend to stay frozen until you find a chance to strike! Zelda and I are going to be hiding at the Bowser statue nearest to your head! I hope you are ready for this plan!

Peach in thought, mentally nods as her eyes shows a spark. Samus smiles as she hears from Zelda that Peach is ready. Samus just hopes that this plan work as the bounty hunters starts to run to where Zelda is.

The plan.......

1252112111112211111211112212121211112112.content:
Zelda activated the Farore's Wind and got the desired results, making Peach sneeze almost immediately. Peach was able to keep the noise to a minimum, and it was hardly heard over the raging battle going on nearby. Peach also kept herself entirely still, to lie in wait until an opportunity to strike came. Zelda and Samus ran as fast as they could to avoid the oncoming mucous, but it was no use and the two tiniest girls were caught in the nasty sticky stuff.

"Ugh... Remind me not to do that again..." Samus groaned.

"Indeed. But hopefully this gives Robin the edge he needs in this fight." Zelda said.

At the uneven fight, Robin was getting cornered by both of his enemies attacking him together with their blades. Robin tried his best to block both of his attacker's assaults, but even with all his skill he was unable to avoid a final thrust from Shadow Lucina's sword. Robin grunted and fell to the floor in pain. He kept a tight grip on his sword though, and tried to ward off another attack by pointing it at the two.

"Hahaha! I think this is all but over now, don't you agree?" Shadow Robin said to Lucina's shadow.

"Hmph. Yes, it's all thanks to me." Shadow Lucina replied shortly. Her dismissive tone earned her a glare from her partner.

"What's that supposed to mean?" Shadow Robin asked. "Are you implying you don't need my help?"

"I'm not implying anything, I'm flat out saying it, you fool!" Shadow Lucina shouted. She pushed the dark Robin aside and moved towards Robin to deliver the finishing blow. Robin wasn't out yet, but the twisted version of Lucina simply knocked his sword away with her own and held the tip to Robin's throat.

"Any last words?" Shadow Lucina asked, to which Robin simply scoffed. The defeated tactician felt awful for failing his friends, he was sure it was the end now, he just hoped that the girls would be able to escape. He closed his eyes and awaited his fate.

Meanwhile, Shadow Robin was furious with Shadow Lucina's actions, and so went over to Peach's still seemingly frozen body to finish her off. Mumbling to himself, Shadow Robin grabbed his sword and readied it to strike. But just then, and with a devious shine in her eyes, Peach got up and giggled and launched herself in a "Peach Bomber" hip attack. The mushroom kingdom princess was so fast and agile that Shadow Robin had barely any time to react to the move, just barely able to get out a surprised gasp before being struck by the technique's explosive finish.

"Ngaahh!" Shadow Robin screamed as he was blasted into the wall, then knocked down on his face by gravity's pull.

"Robin!" Shadow Lucina shouted. From her tone it was clear she was not calling out to him out of worry, but out of disappointment in her partner's inability to fight. She readied her blade in a defensive stance.

Meanwhile, the real Robin got up and knocked Shadow Lucina away with a smash attack of his own while she was distracted, and then went over to Peach. The ever cheerful princess smiled and pulled him in for a big hug.

"I'm glad you're safe, Peach!" Robin exclaimed.

"Yep! It's all thanks to Sammy and Zelly!" Peach told him happily.

"Oh... I see..." Robin said, wondering what Peach meant by that. Even though he placed great trust in the two smallest smashers, he could hardly believe that Samus and Zelda were able to do much of anything at their sizes. He wanted to know more about their plan and their safety, but right now, as he watched Shadow Robin and Shadow Lucina both get back up with fierce anger in their eyes, he knew it would be better to focus on the fight for the time being.

"Damn it, Lucina! What were you thinking!?" Shadow Robin chided his partner, much to her anger.

"Screw you! I was about to finish one of them, until you decided you had to fail at something else! Idiot!" Shadow Lucina shouted back.

"Looks like they're not so good at teamwork after all." Robin noted.

"C'mon, Robin! Let's show these fakers how it's done!" Peach smiled. Robin nodded, and the two smashers prepared themselves for a more fair two-on-two fight...

125222222221221211222112112212.content:
Fuuka stirred the milk into her coffee. Next she brought the cup up to her lips and drank it. Fuuka quite enjoyed the added flavor, blissfully unaware that it was in fact not milk.

"Aah, that's better!" Fuuka said, as she finished her cup.

Fuuka then heard some little noises, like quiet little squeaks. She looked around the room for the source, then she saw it. A tiny little figure on the table! Fuuka was so shocked to see this, she nearly dropped her cup. But Fuuka held on and cautiously examined the little figure. It couldn't be much bigger than her own toe, she noted, and it looked eerily similar to SEES leader, Minato Arisato, she thought. Then she heard it speak again, this time she was close enough to hear it.

"Fuuka, it's me!" Minato shouted at the giantess. "I've been shrunken, by the same liquid you've just mixed into your coffee!"

"Minato..?" Fuuka asked.

"Yes, Fuuka!" Minato shouted.

Minato motioned for the giantess Fuuka to come closer, which she did. Making for a somewhat imposing sight for shrunken man. And for Fuuka, she could now see that Minato was devoid of any clothes, he was completely nude! The blue haired girl blushed at the sight.

"Listen, that stuff you put in your coffee just now is the same stuff that caused me to end up like this!" Minato explained.

"Oh no!" Fuuka gasped. She'd never have believed it, but with the team leader at such a small size in front of her, she had to. "But it was just milk..?"

"No, it's something else." Minato said. "Look, you might be shrinking very soon."

"W-What do I do?" Fuuka asked, starting to worry.

"All we can do now is wait for the effects to take place." Minato stated.

"Am I... Am I going to be naked, like you?" Fuuka asked.

"Yes." Minato flatly said. "There's no way around it, I'm afraid."

"Oh, well in that case..." Fuuka started. "I think I should go..."

"What?" Minato asked.

"Um, goodbye!" Fuuka said.

Minato had no time to respond, Fuuka quickly got up off of her chair and started out of the room. unfortunately for her, she didn't get too far before the strange liquid's effects kicked in. Minato watched from the table as Fuuka was almost instantly swallowed up into her own clothes.
Fuuka didn't know what was happening, one second she was running out of the room, and the next, she was covered by large black fabric. The blue haired girl crawled around inside for a while, trying to find a way out. Eventually she made it. When she did she saw that her fears were realized, she had shrunk, just like Minato said she would, the world was now gigantic to her. And she noticed, with great embarrassment, that she was completely nude, and the place she had just crawled out from was her own school uniform.

"Oh no, no, no!" Fuuka cried. "This can't be happening!"

Fuuka couldn't take the shock of it all, even though Minato had warned her this would happen, it was still too much for the girl. She fainted shortly after.

Minato saw the whole scene from on top of the table. Fuuka was passed out, and she was the same size he currently is. Then he saw Mitsuru approach him.

"What happened?" She asked. "I saw her run off, but then..."

"She's over there." Minato said, pointing to Fuuka's location across the room. He picked up Mitsuru so she could see.

"Oh, poor girl..." Mitsuru softly said. "It must've been too hard for her to handle...."

"Yeah..." Minato said.

1252222222212212112221121122121111221112.content:
Despite the darkness of the bag and the other items in there, which became large obstacles at their sizes, the three inch tall people hefted the bottle out of Yukari's bag with relative ease. They came out of the bag triumphantly and set the bottle down to take a break.

"Phew!" Yukari panted. "That's way too heavy! There's no way we can carry that all the way to Paulownia Mall at our size!"

"It's going to be tough." Minato said, even he was worn out from carrying the bottle the little distance they did. "But we can make it if we try."

"Yeah..." Fuuka added, trying to catch her breath. "We just need, huff, to keep at it..!"

While they were resting, the tiniest member of the group, Mitsuru, ran up to them.

"Minato, this thing just appeared while you three were in Takeba's bag." Mitsuru explained, pointing at the thing.

The three inch tall people looked and saw that there was now a plate sitting next to Yukari's bag. There was a piece of food on it, and it looked to be about their size. A note was also attached to it.

"I-It's a Takoyaki ball!" Fuuka exclaimed, recognizing the snack. "And it's our size!"

"This just appeared, you say?" Minato asked Mitsuru.

"Yes. I was waiting for you all to come back, and it just suddenly appeared." Mitsuru replied.

"Hmm... How strange." Minato said.

"Yeah, and look, there's a note on it." Yukari pointed out.

The note was easily visible to everyone in the group, it read, "eat me -E".

"Eat me... E?" Yukari asked. "What's the E for?"

"I wonder..." Mitsuru said. "Perhaps it's an initial?"

The girls were stumped, but Minato thought he knew who was behind this. His guess was that Elizabeth, the velvet room attendant, must've somehow made this Takoyaki ball appear.

"Wait a minute, I know what it is!" Fuuka suddenly exclaimed.

"You do?" Yukari asked.

"Yes. This is like something out of 'Alice in Wonderland', you know, the book?" Fuuka asked.

"Ah, yes. I've heard of it." Mitsuru said. "Can you tell us more?"

"Sure." Fuuka said, happy to explain. "Throughout the book, the main character Alice shrinks and grows. Just like we've been doing! But in the book, Alice finds a cake labeled eat me, and it makes her grow."

"Oh, I see!" Yukari shouts. "You think this thing'll make us grow, right?"

"Yes!" Fuuka exclaimed. "At least, I hope. One other thing about the book I just realized, Alice drinks from a bottle that makes her shrink."

"So it is just like what's happened to us." Mitsuru said, then turned to Minato. "Minato, just who gave you that bottle in the first place?"

"A friend." Minato answered back quickly, and just as quickly tried to change the subject. "I agree with Fuuka, let's try this Takoyaki ball and see if it works."

"I think you're right." Yukari agreed. "But, who will be the one to try it?"

"I'm sorry, but I think that's all I've got.." Mitsuru whispered.

Mitsuru blushed at his comment, she understood what he meant. "Thanks, Minato." She softly said.

Mitsuru picked up Yukari's discarded clothing and put it on. It had some dirt on it from being on the floor, but Mitsuru didn't complain, they were her only option after all. At her new size, they were far too big for her. She imagined that she might now look like a child playing dress up or something. But again, she had no other choice, lest she run around in nude. "Minato, I don't like the way you're talking right now.." Mitsuru said. She was starting to become a little upset with her little boyfriend.

The alley that it was in wasn't far, but at his reduced size and having to carry the bottle by himself made it considerably more of a difficult trek than usual.

135232211.content:
(Loosely based on SW short story "The Prize")

"Gather 'round, Khaki staffers!" the ever-perky Chrissy chirped as the morning rush at the Khaki Barn finally slowed. Nikki sighed wearily as she shuffled over to the main checkout counter. Kristen and Kirsten were, of course, already there.

"It's time to choose which Khaki Barn employee will get to be this month's special prize."

Nikki was puzzled. "Uh, special prize? Don't you mean special prize winner?"

Chrissy shook her head. "Uh, did I stutter, Nikki? I said special prize, and I meant it." Her face twisted into an evil smile. "And, as a matter of fact, I think I'll nominate you." All of a sudden, she pulled a cheesy-looking fake gun out from behind her back.

"Khaki Barn Head Office just started letting me use this cool new Shrink Ray gun for use in our new promotion."

Nikki snorted. "Seriously? A shrink ray? Wake me when the 1950's are over."

"Oh, it's real. Just watch."

Without warning, Chrissy squeezed the trigger and opened fire on Nikki. Within seconds, Nikki found the world to be seemingly expanding around her.
135232211.title: Shrinks-Teen

1352322111.content:
Even her clothes. Nikki hitched up her pants just as they started to lose purchase on her hips. Her shoulders started to slip through the collar of her white tank top. A note of true fear crept into her voice.

"W-wait! Why aren't my clothes shrinking?"

Chrissy scoffed nonchalantly. "Sorry. Stuff you're wearing on the outside won't shrink. Only stuff on the inside. It's all this science-y stuff. Oh, good thing it seems to be working on those facial piercings of yours. Otherwise..."

"Eew!" Kristen and Kirsten chorused together. By now, Nikki was in a state of total panic as she sunk below Chrissy's waist level.

"Y-You can't do this! This has got to be illegal! S-Someone help me!"

But by now Nikki was too small for some people to hear her properly. Not wanting to take any chances, Chrissy turned up the settings on the Shrink Ray. "Better safe than sorry," she muttered as she shot Nikki again. The poor girl instantly found herself swamped in her tank top, its weight seemingly increasing on top of her.

Chrissy reached down and plucked the miniature and unclad Nikki out of the folds. Kristen and Kirsten cooed over her sweetly as she vainly tried to cover herself.

"Ooh! She is so cute!"

"Why don't you take a picture," Nikki grumbled. "It lasts longer."

Kristen giggled. "Sorry, Nikki."

"Yeah, we couldn't, like, hear you!"

"Eee!"

Nikki covered her ears, forgetting for the moment about her nudity.

"Ugh! It's, like, ten times worse when you're smaller!" Her eyes widened. "Now there's something I never thought I'd say."

"Down girls", Chrissy admonished as she carried Nikki into the back room. Once they were alone, she put her shrunken victim down.

"Easy, Nikki. We've got a special little prize costume all set up here in the back.

Within minutes, Nikki found herself dressed in the same red T-shirt/jeans combo that Chrissy and the two Clone girls always wore. "You are one sick puppy."

"Whatever. It's better than the alternative. So here's how it works: We slip you into one of the pockets of a pair of jeans. Whoever buys them finds you inside, and then they bring you up to the cash for a prize. Doesn't that sound like fun?"

"I'd rather some pervo used me for sex."

"Well, isn't it great then that you don't really have a choice?" Chrissy grinned wickedly as she pulled a pair of jeans from behind her back. "See you later!"

The larger girl then unceremoniously dropped the smaller Nikki into one of the pockets. Nikki felt herself being carried back out onto the display floor. She grimaced as she pushed away a clump of pocket lint that was the size of her foot.

Who winds up "winning the prize?"

The shrinking process had not been long, it only took a few minutes before finishing, neither had it shrunk the princess's clothes. Anna's body had receded into them, shrinking smaller and smaller until she was just a tiny little thing covered completely by her now tent-like clothing. The Arendelle princess got up mere minutes later.

"Ugh... What happened?" Anna asked herself, she groggily shook the sleep from her eyes as she sat up. She felt a chill run over her body and looked down. "Wh-What?! M-My clothes..!?" She exclaimed, now jolted fully awake by this turn of events.

Anna quickly covered herself with some sheets and looked around, but it was hard to see in the dark place she was now in. She wondered where she was and what happened to her. All she remembered was eating that delicious little sweet and then, did she pass out? She shook her head and tried to remember.

Anna was scared of these unknown surroundings, but knew she had to press on. The walls around her, fabric-like, moved easily with little effort from the shrunken princess. Soon, Anna had pressed her way out of the cramped, dark area.

She now found herself on a bed, her bed, she recognized quickly. But something was off about it, it was huge! Her bed now seemed to stretch on forever to the shrunken princess. She sat down on her massive sheets, using them to cover herself.

"Whoa. This is must be some really weird dream..." Anna tried to assure herself. But it felt far too real to be a dream.

Anna looked down and saw that she wasn't on her sheets after all, the tiny woman realized now that she was sitting on her own oversized clothes! Anna gasped at this, she now understood why she was naked, and that she had been crawling through her own clothes the whole time. Then she came to another realization. She had thought her bed and clothes had grown to extraordinary sizes, but it was now obvious to her that she was the one who had changed size, she had shrunk!

Anna moved into position, ready to execute her "perfect" plan. But, the spider wasn't going to have any of it. The huge insect suddenly charged at the poor, tiny girl!

"Aaaagh, no!" Anna screamed. She quickly turned and ran away from the big bug. "Get away from me!"

Anna was running as fast as she could, but the spider was no slouch, it was keeping the pace with her easily. Soon the spider had even started gaining on her.

Anna looked behind herself for a moment, only to see the giant, disgusting and horrifying creature was nearly caught up to her by now! She knew she had to do something, and fast, otherwise she'd end up as spider food!
But the dark passageway she was in made it hard for Anna to see anything she could use to help her out, and the place was so narrow too it was impossible for her to try and trick the spider again. Anna had no choice but to keep running, and hope the spider would tire out or something.

As the frantic chase continued, Anna noticed the passageway seemed to be getting more and more narrow. Pretty soon she'd not have much room to move herself, spelling her doom. But then, Anna had an idea.

That's it! Anna thought. If I can just stay ahead of this guy, then I'll make out of here in one piece!

Anna picked up her pace, running even faster then before. The spider seemed to notice this as it sped up as well. The two were soon running almost neck and neck when, all of a sudden, the dark inner passageways of the wall became too narrow for the spider, it got stuck in-between the walls!

Anna stopped running and looked back when she noticed the spider had stopped moving. The monstrous insect was stuck between the walls, confined to shaking it's legs rapidly in a futile attempt to get free.

"Ha! Nice try, buddy!" Anna taunted the spider. "But I'm not ending up as someone's lunch today!" Anna huffed and walked away, her head held high.

She was ecstatic to have made it past the spider, but as soon as her gloating was over she stepped into something squishy and wet. Anna flinched and looked down, her foot was covered in something, she couldn't quite tell what in the darkness, but she knew it was disgusting.

"Ugh! This sucks!" Anna whined. "I just wanna get out of here!" She moaned.

Anna wiped her foot on a drier part of the floor and pressed on, making sure to avoid any other missteps on the way. The tired, shrunken, naked girl continued her journey. Thankfully the passage she walked didn't get any more narrow, otherwise she'd have gotten stuck like that spider. After several more minutes of walking in near darkness, she made it to another hole in the wall, conveniently placed at her level.

"Finally!" Anna exclaimed. She was happy to see the light at the end of the tunnel. But she didn't know where it would lead her, she had been walking so long, the exit could be anywhere!
